function InitGlobals takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i = 0
    set udg_enemy = Player(20)
    set udg_npc = Player(12)
    set udg_players = 1
    set udg_footmanCount = 3
    set udg_knightCount = 0
    set udg_priestCount = 1
    set udg_archerCount = 1
    set udg_bossmovement = 350
    set udg_enemypower = 1
    set udg_buildSwordmen = false
    set udg_enemiesAround = 0
    set udg_goodgroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_heros = CreateGroup()
    set udg_income = 5
    set udg_mortarCount = 0
    set udg_badgroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_enemy2 = Player(21)
    set udg_enemy3 = Player(22)
    set udg_enemy4 = Player(23)
    set udg_endmade = false
    set udg_bossgroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_battletimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_wintimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_critlevel = 0
    set udg_timereduce = 0
    set udg_pickg = CreateGroup()
    set udg_babi = 0
    set udg_playGroup = CreateForce()
    set udg_buildRanger = false
    set udg_buildHighPriest = false
    set udg_tempGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_enemyUnitCount = 0
    set udg_base = null
    set udg_heroMade = false
    set udg_lumberTimer1 = CreateTimer()
    set udg_lumber = 2
    set udg_lumberTimer2 = CreateTimer()
    set udg_lightningLevel = 0
    set udg_lightninggroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_tempLevel = 0
    set udg_deadHeros = CreateGroup()
    set udg_ItemCleanupFlag = false
    set udg_ItemsToClean = 0
    set udg_ItemCleanupTimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_reslv = 0
    set udg_poisongroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_tempInt = 0
    set udg_outpostGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_outpostCount = 1
    set udg_auxBase = null
    set udg_lumberIncome = 2
    set udg_upgradeLevel = 0
    set udg_heroSpawnChance = 0
    set udg_attributeBonus = 1
    set udg_tempStr = ""
    set udg_foodCount = 0
    set udg_compGroup = CreateForce()
    set udg_compUnits = CreateGroup()
    set udg_maxFood = 250
    set udg_interestRate = 10.00
    set udg_increaseCount = 0
    set udg_foodCountReal = 0
    set udg_createdShop = false
    set udg_visionGroup = CreateForce()
    set udg_neutralHostile = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)
    set udg_enemy5 = Player(19)
    set udg_enemy6 = Player(18)
    set udg_currentPlayer = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 24)
        set udg_heroSelected[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_guardianMade = false
    set udg_normalVotes = 0
    set udg_hardVotes = 0
    set udg_maxPlayers = 12
    set udg_expectedPlayers = 1
    set udg_redBaseOpened = false
    set udg_yellowGateQuest = false
    set udg_villagerCount = 0
    set udg_tempPg = CreateForce()
    set udg_goodUnitCount = 0
    set udg_tempPlayers = 1.00
    set udg_shopKeeperMade = false
    set udg_tempForce = CreateForce()
    set udg_tempBool = false
    set udg_bossCrit = 1
    set udg_bossRez = 0
    set udg_baseMaxed = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 24)
        set udg_rangerSpeed[i] = 300.00
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_purpleBaseOpened = false
    set udg_yellowBaseOpened = false
    set udg_tempPlayerGroup = CreateForce()
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 20)
        set udg_mastery[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 20)
        set udg_querk[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 100)
        set udg_itemStatValues[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_itemStatCount = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 20)
        set udg_legendarySkill[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_bossEvasion = 1
    set udg_endGameTimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_resumeMusicTimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_villagerGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_effectDestroyTimer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_effectCounter = 0
    set udg_tempReal = 0
    set udg_difficultyDialog = DialogCreate()
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 20)
        set udg_difficultyStrings[i] = ""
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 24)
        set udg_difficultyVotes[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_difficultyIndex = 0
    set udg_enemyPlayers = CreateForce()
    set udg_villagerQuestComplete = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 5)
        set udg_hasKey[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_difficultyRatio = 0
    set udg_mtics = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 24)
        set udg_difficultyValues[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Item Tables
//*
//***************************************************************************

function ItemTable000000_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I01Y', 3 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tpow', 3 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'manh', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tdex', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tint', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tstr', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 54 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I01Z', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 5 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I020', 3 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 5 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'lmbr', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I048', 15 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 52 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function ItemTable000001_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tdx2', 20 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tst2', 20 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tin2', 20 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'manh', 20 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 20 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'lmbr', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I020', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 10 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 60 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I01Y', 5 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tpow', 5 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I051', 5 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 85 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction


//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Unit Item Tables
//*
//***************************************************************************

function Unit000034_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 3
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 4
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I036', 60 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 40 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 5
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I03T', 40 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 60 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000164_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I042', 34 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I041', 33 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I01O', 33 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000166_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I046', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I040', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I043', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I01M', 25 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00K', 100 )

        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

function Unit000172_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I03T', 34 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I036', 33 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 33 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tpow', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000189_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tdx2', 100 )

        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tin2', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else

        else

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I00E', 100 )

        endif

    endif

function Unit000239_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I036', 34 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I03T', 33 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 33 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tin2', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tst2', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tdx2', 25 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 25 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'lmbr', 50 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 50 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I05K', 50 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I05J', 50 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'manh', 33 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I036', 34 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I03T', 33 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 25 )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 3
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'lmbr', 50 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 50 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )

            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )

    endif

    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I03T', 50 )
        call RandomDistAddItem( -1, 50 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 1

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'tpow', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 2

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'lmbr', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

        // Item set 3

        call RandomDistAddItem( 'gold', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )

            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction


//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Sound Assets
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\HeroMountainKing\\HeroMountainKingWarcry1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1, 2966 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1 = CreateSound( "Units\\Undead\\HeroDreadLord\\HeroDreadlordWarcry1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1, 1631 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_KnightWarcry1 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\Knight\\KnightWarcry1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1, 3192 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_OrcDefeat = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\OrcDefeat.mp3"
    set gg_snd_OrcVictory = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\OrcVictory.mp3"
    set gg_snd_UndeadDefeat = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\UndeadDefeat.mp3"
    set gg_snd_HumanDefeat = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\HumanDefeat.mp3"
    set gg_snd_Doom = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\Doom.mp3"
    set gg_snd_BloodElfTheme = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\BloodElfTheme.mp3"
    set gg_snd_HumanDefeat01 = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\HumanDefeat.mp3"
    set gg_snd_HumanVictory = "Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\HumanVictory.mp3"
    set gg_snd_GoodJob = CreateSound( "Sound\\Interface\\GoodJob.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_GoodJob, 2548 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_GoodJob, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_GoodJob, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_GoodJob, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Rescue = CreateSound( "Sound\\Interface\\Rescue.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Rescue, 3796 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Rescue, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Rescue, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Rescue, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_SecretFound = CreateSound( "Sound\\Interface\\SecretFound.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_SecretFound, 2525 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_SecretFound, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_SecretFound, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_SecretFound, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1 = CreateSound( "Sound\\Buildings\\Human\\KnightUpgradeComplete1.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1, 1355 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_MuradinTaunt2 = "Sound\\Dialogue\\Extra\\MuradinTaunt2.mp3"
    set gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1 = CreateSound( "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\CallToArms\\HumanCallToArmsWhat1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "SpellsEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1, 3970 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_ResurrectTarget = CreateSound( "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "SpellsEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_ResurrectTarget, 3506 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_ResurrectTarget, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_ResurrectTarget, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_ResurrectTarget, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Warning = CreateSound( "Sound\\Interface\\Warning.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Warning, 1903 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Warning, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Warning, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Warning, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\Muradin\\MuradinYesAttack2.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 1631 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 3000.0 )
    call SetSoundConeAngles( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 0.0, 0.0, 127 )
    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\Muradin\\MuradinYesAttack3.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3, 1607 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\HeroPaladin\\HeroPaladinPissed1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1, 1520 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\HeroPaladin\\HeroPaladinPissed2.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2, 2182 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\HeroPaladin\\HeroPaladinPissed3.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3, 2147 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6 = CreateSound( "Units\\Human\\HeroPaladin\\HeroPaladinPissed6.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6, 9549 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1 = CreateSound( "Units\\Undead\\Necromancer\\NecromancerPissed1.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1, 4284 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_NecromancerPissed2 = CreateSound( "Units\\Undead\\Necromancer\\NecromancerPissed2.wav", false, false, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed2, 3610 )

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Destructable Objects
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateAllDestructables takes nothing returns nothing
    local destructable d
    local trigger t
    local real life
    set gg_dest_ATg2_0691 = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'ATg2', -544.0, 11872.0, 270.000, 1.000, 0, 'ATg2' )
    set gg_dest_B000_1130 = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'B000', -2304.0, -15936.0, 270.000, 0.900, 0, 'B000' )
    set gg_dest_B001_0690 = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'B001', -1792.0, 11328.0, 270.000, 0.900, 0, 'B001' )
    set gg_dest_B002_3464 = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'B002', 4096.0, -1088.0, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'B002' )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'B003', -2080.0, 2784.0, 163.000, 1.140, 0, 'B003' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function ItemTable000001_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'B003', -2144.0, 2784.0, 323.000, 0.884, 1, 'B003' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function ItemTable000001_DropItems )

function CreateAllItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer itemID

    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -3800.9, 9682.8, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -191.2, -15513.1, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', 3522.2, -15082.3, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -156.4, -15589.5, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -3653.7, -5718.3, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -3767.5, -5874.1, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I00K', -3944.8, 225.3, 'I00K' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'I036', 3686.0, 4190.3, 'I036' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', -26.0, -15385.6, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', 1826.1, -14212.1, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', 3556.5, -15016.9, 'gold' )
    set gg_item_gold_0202 = BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', 2705.1, -20516.8, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', -3131.6, 12747.0, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', -3667.4, -5818.9, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'gold', -75.2, -15431.0, 'gold' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'manh', -3744.8, -6300.4, 'manh' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'manh', -3767.3, -7906.9, 'manh' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'manh', -4067.7, -9786.3, 'manh' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'manh', -323.4, -17356.0, 'manh' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'tdex', -287.1, -17465.1, 'tdex' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'tdex', -229.2, -17407.0, 'tdex' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'tdx2', -738.3, -10614.4, 'tdx2' )
    call BlzCreateItemWithSkin( 'tdx2', -1567.4, 14692.0, 'tdx2' )

    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_htow_0020 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'htow', -256.0, -21696.0, 270.000, 'htow' )

    set gg_unit_hhou_0128 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'hhou', -512.0, -21056.0, 270.000, 'hhou' )

function CreateBuildingsForPlayer18 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(18)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_unpl_0243 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'unpl', -2368.0, -9088.0, 270.000, 'unpl' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( t, gg_unit_unpl_0243, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( t, gg_unit_unpl_0243, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Unit000172_DropItems )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralHostile takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'narg', -4509.9, 4630.7, 0.000, 'narg' )

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_h00J_0028 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00J', -4768.0, 4512.0, 270.000, 'h00J' )
    set gg_unit_n00O_0029 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n00O', -2688.0, 10560.0, 270.000, 'n00O' )
    set gg_unit_h00J_0031 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00J', 3680.0, -3040.0, 270.000, 'h00J' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmoo', 3072.0, -19520.0, 270.000, 'nmoo' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n00H', -2688.0, 19904.0, 270.000, 'n00H' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'ncp3', -2688.0, 19904.0, 270.000, 'ncp3' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n013', -512.0, 13504.0, 270.000, 'n013' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00N', 3520.0, 1600.0, 270.000, 'h00N' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfoh', -2304.0, -3072.0, 270.000, 'nfoh' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nwgt', 3264.0, 3712.0, 270.000, 'nwgt' )
    call WaygateSetDestination( u, GetRectCenterX(gg_rct_TPHOME), GetRectCenterY(gg_rct_TPHOME) )
    call WaygateActivate( u, true )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nwgt', 3392.0, -5888.0, 270.000, 'nwgt' )
    call WaygateSetDestination( u, GetRectCenterX(gg_rct_TP1), GetRectCenterY(gg_rct_TP1) )
    call WaygateActivate( u, true )
    set gg_unit_nwgt_0094 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nwgt', 3392.0, 10944.0, 270.000, 'nwgt' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmoo', 4608.0, -1728.0, 270.000, 'nmoo' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfoh', 4736.0, -64.0, 270.000, 'nfoh' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n013', -1536.0, 12672.0, 270.000, 'n013' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n013', -2624.0, 12288.0, 270.000, 'n013' )
    set gg_unit_nwgt_0248 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nwgt', -2752.0, -17728.0, 270.000, 'nwgt' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmoo', -1408.0, -17280.0, 270.000, 'nmoo' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfoh', -1664.0, -18176.0, 270.000, 'nfoh' )
    set gg_unit_n017_0272 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n017', -2816.0, -16384.0, 270.000, 'n017' )
    set gg_unit_n017_0273 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n017', -2240.0, 12928.0, 270.000, 'n017' )
    set gg_unit_n017_0274 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n017', -128.0, 3008.0, 270.000, 'n017' )
    set gg_unit_n017_0275 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n017', 3776.0, -18880.0, 270.000, 'n017' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfoh', 3072.0, -11776.0, 270.000, 'nfoh' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralPassive takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'E001', -1401.0, 22034.0, 188.860, 'E001' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'H004', -3920.9, 20995.5, 358.320, 'H004' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'H000', -1467.5, 21557.1, 180.000, 'H000' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n00N', -2327.7, 10510.8, 237.470, 'n00N' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'O000', -3941.5, 21553.0, 0.000, 'O000' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'H00C', -1465.7, 20981.7, 180.000, 'H00C' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'E002', -3978.3, 22073.5, 0.000, 'E002' )
    set gg_unit_H00L_0042 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'H00L', -3914.3, 20406.4, 0.000, 'H00L' )
    call SetUnitState( gg_unit_H00L_0042, UNIT_STATE_MANA, 85 )
    set gg_unit_E008_0043 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'E008', -1475.6, 20399.7, 180.000, 'E008' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00O', 3529.8, 1611.7, 350.170, 'h00O' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00P', -2678.1, 10524.2, 123.018, 'h00P' )

    set gg_unit_n01D_0063 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n01D', 2386.8, -20830.5, 250.000, 'n01D' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', -535.3, 517.3, 315.515, 'nfro' )

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer12(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer18(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer20(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer21(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer12(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer18(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer20(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer22(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings(  )
    call CreatePlayerBuildings(  )
    call CreateNeutralHostile(  )
    call CreateNeutralPassive(  )
    call CreatePlayerUnits(  )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Regions
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    local weathereffect we

    set gg_rct_start = Rect( -3232.0, 21952.0, -2144.0, 22624.0 )
    set gg_rct_base = Rect( -1504.0, -22784.0, 1376.0, -20352.0 )
    set gg_rct_TPHOME = Rect( 2784.0, -6752.0, 3232.0, -6304.0 )
    set gg_rct_cage4 = Rect( -2176.0, 11648.0, -992.0, 13984.0 )
    set gg_rct_heroarea = Rect( -4256.0, 19360.0, -1216.0, 22944.0 )
    set gg_rct_enemystart = Rect( -960.0, -10720.0, 2976.0, -8736.0 )
    set gg_rct_TP1 = Rect( 2624.0, 2912.0, 3040.0, 3360.0 )
    set gg_rct_cage1 = Rect( -3936.0, -2720.0, -2752.0, -1696.0 )
    set gg_rct_cage2 = Rect( -2720.0, -18336.0, -1056.0, -16576.0 )
    set gg_rct_ItemShopRegion = Rect( 704.0, -22240.0, 1280.0, -21696.0 )
    set gg_rct_secretShopRegion = Rect( -3776.0, 9280.0, -1760.0, 11232.0 )
    set gg_rct_basewg = Rect( 1504.0, -22272.0, 1728.0, -22016.0 )
    set gg_rct_cage3 = Rect( 2624.0, -20224.0, 3584.0, -19136.0 )
    call SetSoundPosition( gg_snd_CityscapeFountainLoop1, 3104.0, -19680.0, -55.4 )
    call RegisterStackedSound( gg_snd_CityscapeFountainLoop1, true, 960.0, 1088.0 )
    set gg_rct_randomhero = Rect( -2848.0, 19744.0, -2528.0, 20064.0 )
    set gg_rct_itemdummy = Rect( -4608.0, 11456.0, -4064.0, 12256.0 )
    set gg_rct_enemybase = Rect( 2272.0, 17728.0, 3392.0, 18816.0 )
    set gg_rct_qo1 = Rect( -3904.0, 5728.0, -1248.0, 7072.0 )
    set we = AddWeatherEffect( gg_rct_qo1, 'WNcw' )
    call EnableWeatherEffect( we, true )
    set gg_rct_qo2 = Rect( -224.0, 6464.0, 1120.0, 7936.0 )
    set we = AddWeatherEffect( gg_rct_qo2, 'WNcw' )
    call EnableWeatherEffect( we, true )
    set gg_rct_airspawn = Rect( 352.0, 12672.0, 3712.0, 15712.0 )
    set we = AddWeatherEffect( gg_rct_airspawn, 'FDrl' )
    call EnableWeatherEffect( we, true )
    set gg_rct_Bspawn1 = Rect( -3360.0, 7488.0, -2432.0, 9632.0 )
    set we = AddWeatherEffect( gg_rct_Bspawn1, 'WNcw' )
    call EnableWeatherEffect( we, true )
    set gg_rct_Bspawn3 = Rect( -1216.0, 8320.0, -32.0, 9536.0 )
    set we = AddWeatherEffect( gg_rct_Bspawn3, 'WNcw' )
    call EnableWeatherEffect( we, true )
    set gg_rct_Bspawn2 = Rect( -2304.0, 7136.0, -992.0, 8320.0 )
    set gg_rct_Aspawn1 = Rect( 384.0, 15744.0, 1728.0, 17088.0 )
    set gg_rct_Aspawn2 = Rect( 704.0, 17120.0, 2016.0, 18272.0 )
    set gg_rct_Aspawn4 = Rect( 1120.0, 18336.0, 2048.0, 19392.0 )

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************
function addGold takes integer gold returns nothing
	local integer i = 0
	loop
		exitwhen i >= udg_maxPlayers
		call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(i), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(i), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + R2I(gold*(udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))) ) )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
endfunction

function addLumber takes integer lumber returns nothing
	local integer i = 0
	loop
		exitwhen i >= udg_maxPlayers
		call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(i), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(Player(i), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + R2I(lumber*(udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players)) ) ) )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
endfunction

function getPlayerCount takes nothing returns integer
	local integer playerCount = 0
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		if udg_heroSelected[i] and GetPlayerSlotState(Player(i)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING and IsPlayerInForce(Player(i), GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER)) then
			set playerCount=playerCount+1
		endif
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	return playerCount
endfunction


function getExpectedPlayerCount takes nothing returns integer
	local integer playerCount = 0
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		if GetPlayerSlotState(Player(i)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING and IsPlayerInForce(Player(i), GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER)) then
			set playerCount=playerCount+1
		endif
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	return playerCount
endfunction

function createItem takes integer s, real i, unit u returns nothing
    local integer percentageChance = R2I(i)
    if GetRandomInt(0, percentageChance) == 1 then
	set udg_itempos = GetUnitLoc(u)
    	call CreateItemLoc(s, udg_itempos)
	call RemoveLocation(udg_itempos)
    endif
endfunction

function spawnTome takes nothing returns nothing
	call createItem('lmbr', 60,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('gold', 100 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I020', 350 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I01Z', 350 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('100K', 250,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tdex', 150 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tdx2', 300,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tint', 100 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tin2', 300,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tpow', 300,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tstr', 100 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tst2', 300,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('manh', 100 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I051', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I00Q', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I01Y', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
endfunction

function spawnB takes integer amount, integer unitType, rect spawn, rect target returns nothing
	local integer i = 0
	local integer newAmount = amount
	local real minX = GetRectMinX(spawn)
	local real minY = GetRectMinY(spawn)
	local real maxX = GetRectMaxX(spawn) - minX
	local real maxY = GetRectMaxY(spawn) - minY
	local real divX = maxX/amount + 5
	local real divY = maxY/amount + 5
	local real x = 0
	local real y = 0
	
	if amount > 60 then
		set newAmount = 60
	endif
	if ( udg_enemyUnitCount+newAmount < 350) then
	set divX = maxX/newAmount  + 5
	set divY = maxY/newAmount  + 5
	set udg_enemyUnitCount=udg_enemyUnitCount+newAmount 
	loop
		exitwhen i >= newAmount 
		set udg_bspawnp = OffsetLocation(Location(minX, minY), x, y)
		call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, unitType, udg_enemies[udg_currentPlayer], udg_bspawnp, bj_UNIT_FACING )
		set udg_currentPlayer = udg_currentPlayer + 1
		if udg_currentPlayer > 5 then
			set udg_currentPlayer = 0
		endif
		call RemoveLocation(udg_bspawnp)
		set udg_bspawnp = GetRectCenter(target)
		call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_bspawnp )
		call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_badgroup )
		call RemoveLocation(udg_bspawnp)
		set i = i + 1
		set x = x + divX
		if x >= maxX then
			set x=0
			set y=y+divY
		endif
	endloop
	endif
endfunction


function spawnBC takes integer amount, integer unitType, rect spawn, rect target returns nothing
	local integer i = 0
	local integer newAmount = amount
	local real minX = GetRectMinX(spawn)
	local real minY = GetRectMinY(spawn)
	local real maxX = GetRectMaxX(spawn) - minX
	local real maxY = GetRectMaxY(spawn) - minY
	local real divX = maxX/amount + 5
	local real divY = maxY/amount + 5
	local real x = 0
	local real y = 0
	
	if amount > 30 then
		set newAmount = 30
	endif
	if ( udg_enemyUnitCount+newAmount < 300) then
	set divX = maxX/newAmount  + 5
	set divY = maxY/newAmount  + 5
	set udg_enemyUnitCount=udg_enemyUnitCount+newAmount
	loop
		exitwhen i >= newAmount 
		set udg_bspawnp = OffsetLocation(Location(minX, minY), x, y)
		call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, unitType, udg_enemies[udg_currentPlayer], udg_bspawnp, bj_UNIT_FACING )
		call RemoveLocation(udg_bspawnp)
		call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_badgroup )
		set udg_currentPlayer = udg_currentPlayer + 1
		if udg_currentPlayer > 5 then
			set udg_currentPlayer = 0
		endif
		set udg_bspawnp = GetRectCenter(target)
		call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_bspawnp )
		call RemoveLocation(udg_bspawnp)
		set i = i + 1
		set x = x + divX
		if x >= maxX then
			set x=0
			set y=y+divY
		endif
	endloop
	endif
endfunction

function spawnG takes integer amount, integer unitType, rect spawn, rect target returns nothing
	local integer i = 0
	if ( udg_goodUnitCount+amount < 100 ) then
		set udg_goodUnitCount=udg_goodUnitCount+amount
		loop
			exitwhen i >= amount
			set udg_gspawnp = GetRandomLocInRect(spawn)
			call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, unitType, udg_npc, udg_gspawnp, bj_UNIT_FACING )
			call RemoveLocation(udg_gspawnp)
			call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_goodgroup )
			set udg_gspawnp = GetRectCenter(target)
			call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_gspawnp )
			call RemoveLocation(udg_gspawnp)
			set i = i + 1
		endloop
	endif
endfunction
//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: pamtihs
//===========================================================================
function Trig_pamtihs_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomDefeatBJ( Player(0), "TRIGSTR_926" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_pamtihs takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_pamtihs = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_pamtihs, Player(0), "SHITMAP", false )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_pamtihs, function Trig_pamtihs_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: showDifficultyButtons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_showDifficultyButtons_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogDisplayBJ( true, udg_difficultyDialog, GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_showDifficultyButtons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogSetMessageBJ( udg_difficultyDialog, "TRIGSTR_589" )
    set udg_difficultyStrings[0] = "|c00C0FFC0Weak Scum|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[1] = "|c0080FF80Mild Fool|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[2] = "|c00C8808FTalented Bone Muncher|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[3] = "|c00640000Annihilator|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[4] = "|cffff0000B|r|cffe61800o|r|cffcc3200n|r|cffb34b00e|r|cff996500a|r|cff807e00g|r|cff669800e|r|cff4db100d|r|cff33cb00d|r|cff1ae400o|r|cff00fe00n|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[5] = "|cffffffffC|r|cffedededh|r|cffdbdbdba|r|cffc9c9c9o|r|cffb7b7b7t|r|cffa4a4a4i|r|cff929292c|r|cff808080 |r|cff6e6e6eC|r|cff5c5c5ca|r|cff494949l|r|cff373737c|r|cff252525i|r|cff131313u|r|cff000000m|r"
    set udg_difficultyStrings[6] = "|cff00ffffBIG|r |cffffff00SKELETAL|r |cffff0000ENERGY|r"
    set udg_difficultyValues[0] = 0
    set udg_difficultyValues[1] = 2
    set udg_difficultyValues[2] = 4
    set udg_difficultyValues[3] = 6
    set udg_difficultyValues[4] = 8
    set udg_difficultyValues[5] = 10
    set udg_difficultyValues[6] = 12
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DialogAddButtonBJ( udg_difficultyDialog, udg_difficultyStrings[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
        set udg_difficultyButton[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_showDifficultyButtons_Func017A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_showDifficultyButtons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_showDifficultyButtons = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_showDifficultyButtons, function Trig_showDifficultyButtons_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: tallyDifficulty
//===========================================================================
function Trig_tallyDifficulty_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_difficultyVotes[GetForLoopIndexA()] > udg_tempInt ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_tallyDifficulty_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempInt = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_tallyDifficulty_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempInt = GetForLoopIndexA()
            set udg_difficultyIndex = udg_difficultyValues[GetForLoopIndexA()]
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_interestRate = 10.00
    set udg_foodCount = 5
    set udg_foodCountReal = I2R(udg_foodCount)
    call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, ( "" + ( "Difficulty Selected: " + udg_difficultyStrings[udg_tempInt] ) ) )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_SecretFound )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_itemDrops )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_enemyScaling, ( 500.00 - ( I2R(udg_difficultyIndex) * 5.00 ) ) )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setDifficulty )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_tallyDifficulty takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_tallyDifficulty = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_tallyDifficulty, function Trig_tallyDifficulty_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: clickDifficultyButton
//===========================================================================
function Trig_clickDifficultyButton_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_difficultyButton[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_clickDifficultyButton_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_clickDifficultyButton_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_difficultyVotes[GetForLoopIndexA()] = ( udg_difficultyVotes[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_clickDifficultyButton takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_clickDifficultyButton = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ( gg_trg_clickDifficultyButton, udg_difficultyDialog )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_clickDifficultyButton, function Trig_clickDifficultyButton_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_summon, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), "666", true )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_cinematicStart )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_preloadAbilities )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_initArrays )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_initMain )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_createRacoon )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_computerRacoon )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 10.00 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_showDifficultyButtons )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 15.00 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_tallyDifficulty )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_initAttack )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_init = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_init, 0.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_init, function Trig_init_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cinematicStart
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cinematicStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUserControlForceOff( udg_playGroup )
    call CinematicModeBJ( true, udg_playGroup )
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_cinematicStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_cinematicStart = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_cinematicStart, function Trig_cinematicStart_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: initArrays
//===========================================================================

    set udg_enemyBase3 = gg_unit_unpl_0243
    set udg_enemyBase4 = gg_unit_unpl_0190
    set udg_enemies[0] = Player(18)
    set udg_enemies[1] = Player(19)
    set udg_enemies[2] = Player(20)
    set udg_enemies[3] = Player(21)
    set udg_enemies[4] = Player(22)
    set udg_enemies[5] = Player(23)
    set udg_bosses[0] = 'Nman'
    set udg_bosses[1] = 'Uwar'
    set udg_bosses[2] = 'N014'
    set udg_bosses[3] = 'Nman'
    set udg_bosses[4] = 'Nmag'

    set udg_bossabilities[11] = 'A009'
    set udg_bossabilities[12] = 'A00H'
    set udg_bossabilities[13] = 'A00F'
    set udg_bossabilities[14] = 'A03N'
    set udg_bossabilities[15] = 'A00G'
    set udg_bossabilities[16] = 'A02K'
    set udg_bossabilities[17] = 'A00J'

    set udg_bossabilities[19] = 'A07A'

    set udg_randomItems[5] = 'I038'
    set udg_randomItems[6] = 'I01E'
    set udg_randomItems[7] = 'I01N'
    set udg_randomItems[8] = 'I01J'
    set udg_randomItems[9] = 'I01N'
    set udg_randomItems[10] = 'I01M'
    set udg_randomItems[11] = 'I01R'
    set udg_randomItems[12] = 'I01O'
    set udg_randomItems[13] = 'I04N'
    set udg_randomItems[14] = 'I00P'
    set udg_randomItems[15] = 'I01D'
    set udg_randomItems[16] = 'I016'
    set udg_randomItems[17] = 'I027'
    set udg_randomItems[18] = 'I04M'
    set udg_randomItems[19] = 'I03T'
    set udg_randomItems[20] = 'I036'
    set udg_randomItems[21] = 'I003'
    set udg_randomItems[22] = 'I02C'
    set udg_randomItems[23] = 'ches'
    set udg_herotypes[0] = 'H000'
    set udg_herotypes[1] = 'E002'
    set udg_herotypes[2] = 'O000'
    set udg_herotypes[3] = 'E001'
    set udg_herotypes[4] = 'H004'
    set udg_herotypes[5] = 'H00C'
    set udg_herotypes[6] = 'H00L'
    set udg_herotypes[7] = 'E008'
    set udg_herotypes[8] = 'E00A'
    set udg_outposts[0] = gg_rct_outpost1
    set udg_outposts[1] = gg_rct_outpost2
    set udg_outposts[2] = gg_rct_outpost3
    set udg_outposts[3] = gg_rct_outpost4
    set udg_outposts[4] = gg_rct_outpost5
    set udg_wanderers[0] = 'nvlk'
    set udg_wanderers[1] = 'nvk2'
    set udg_wanderers[2] = 'nvlw'
    set udg_wanderers[3] = 'nvl2'
    set udg_wanderers[4] = 'nvil'
    set udg_itemSounds[0] = gg_snd_MetalLightChopMetal1
    set udg_itemSounds[1] = gg_snd_MetalLightChopMetal2
    set udg_itemSounds[2] = gg_snd_MetalLightChopMetal3
    set udg_itemSounds[3] = gg_snd_MetalLightSliceMetal1
    set udg_itemSounds[4] = gg_snd_MetalLightSliceMetal2
    set udg_itemSounds[5] = gg_snd_MetalLightSliceMetal3
    set udg_itemSounds[6] = gg_snd_MetalMediumChopMetal1
    set udg_itemSounds[7] = gg_snd_MetalMediumSliceMetal1
    set udg_itemSounds[8] = gg_snd_MetalMediumSliceMetal2
    set udg_itemSounds[9] = gg_snd_MetalMediumSliceMetal3
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_initArrays takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_initArrays = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_initArrays, function Trig_initArrays_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: initMain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_initMain_Func003002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func003002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_initMain_Func003002001001(), Trig_initMain_Func003002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_players > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func045A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func047Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func047A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func047Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), true )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func048Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func048A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func048Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), true )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func049Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func049A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func049Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), true )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func050Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'DTes' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func050A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func050Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( gg_trg_eggsack, GetEnumDestructable() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func051Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'B003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func051A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func051Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( gg_trg_bloodsack, GetEnumDestructable() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Func052C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_expectedPlayers == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_initMain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    set udg_expectedPlayers = getExpectedPlayerCount()
    set udg_playGroup = GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_initMain_Func003002001))
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func004C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( gg_unit_hgtw_0263 )
    else
    endif
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( udg_npc, PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 100 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( udg_npc, PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, 100 )
    call SetMapFlag( MAP_LOCK_RESOURCE_TRADING, true )
    call SetCreepCampFilterState( false )
    set udg_base = gg_unit_htow_0020
    set udg_auxBase = gg_unit_unp1_0139
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 19
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 24
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple( ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_enemyPlayers )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[18], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[19], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[21], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[22], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[23], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[18], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[19], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[21], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[22], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[23], bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_H00L_0042, udg_lightninggroup )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_E008_0043, udg_poisongroup )
    call FogMaskEnableOn(  )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rufb', 1, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rolf', 1, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Robf', 1, udg_npc )
    set udg_base = gg_unit_htow_0020
    set udg_itemShop = gg_unit_n007_0052
    set udg_reslv = 1
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_B000_1130, true )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_B001_0690, true )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_ATg2_0691, true )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_B002_3464, true )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_Dofv_14376, true )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_Dofv_14376 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_initQuests )
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( udg_enemy, 320.00 )
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( udg_npc, 200.00 )
    set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
    call GroupAddGroup( udg_tempGroup, GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_cage2, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) )
    call GroupAddGroup( udg_tempGroup, GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_furblogAreaMain, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_initMain_Func045A )
    call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, function Trig_initMain_Func047A )
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_cage2, function Trig_initMain_Func048A )
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_furblogAreaMain, function Trig_initMain_Func049A )
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( GetEntireMapRect(), function Trig_initMain_Func050A )
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( GetEntireMapRect(), function Trig_initMain_Func051A )
    if ( Trig_initMain_Func052C() ) then
        set udg_bossabilities[0] = 'A072'
        set udg_bossabilities[1] = 'A06Z'
        set udg_bossabilities[2] = 'A070'
        set udg_bossabilities[6] = 'A071'
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_initMain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_initMain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_initMain, function Trig_initMain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: preloadAbilities
//===========================================================================
function Trig_preloadAbilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_itemdummy)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H011', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 16
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_bossabilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( udg_bossabilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A005', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A046', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'N018', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05Z', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05Y', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H011', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A044', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A045', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A048', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 19
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_bosses[GetForLoopIndexA()], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveUnit( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_preloadAbilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_preloadAbilities = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_preloadAbilities, function Trig_preloadAbilities_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: initAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_initAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6776" )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_initAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_initAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_initAttack, function Trig_initAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: computerRacoon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER )
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetFilterPlayer()) < 9 )
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002001(), Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001001(), Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetEnumPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2050.00, 0 )
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ( true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_heroarea )
    set udg_vis[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] = GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nrac', GetEnumPlayer(), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_start), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 0 )
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()) )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_randomhero)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_tempPoint )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

function Trig_computerRacoon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_compGroup = GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_computerRacoon_Func001002001))
    call ForForce( udg_compGroup, function Trig_computerRacoon_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_computerRacoon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_computerRacoon = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_computerRacoon, function Trig_computerRacoon_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: createRacoon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_createRacoon_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), gg_rct_heroarea )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetEnumPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2050.00, 0 )
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ( true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_heroarea )
    set udg_vis[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] = GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_start)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nrac', GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()) )
    call SetUserControlForceOn( GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()) )
endfunction

function Trig_createRacoon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_BattleNetWooshStereo1 )
    call CinematicModeExBJ( false, udg_playGroup, 2.00 )
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_createRacoon_Func004A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_createRacoon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_createRacoon = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_createRacoon, function Trig_createRacoon_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: initQuests
//===========================================================================
function Trig_initQuests_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_235", "TRIGSTR_236", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTownHall.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_240", "TRIGSTR_241", "ReplaceableTextures\\WorldEditUI\\StartingLocation.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_365", "TRIGSTR_374", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBundleOfLumber.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_375", "TRIGSTR_378", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonWarrior.blp" )
    set udg_defendQuest = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_379", "TRIGSTR_388", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonArcher.blp" )
    set udg_mainquest = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_389", "TRIGSTR_392", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNChaosBlademaster.blp" )
    set udg_captainJack = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_393", "TRIGSTR_396", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonArcher.blp" )
    set udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_397", "TRIGSTR_400", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBloodKey.blp" )
    set udg_gateQuest = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "overhead", gg_unit_n01B_0110, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\TalkToMe\\TalkToMe.mdl" )
    set udg_surviveQuestMark = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_n01B_0110, 'Aply', true )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_n01B_0110, 'AChw', true )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_n01B_0110, 'A05F', true )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_n01B_0110, 'A07S', true )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_h017_0111, 'ANta', true )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( gg_unit_h017_0111, 'A05L', true )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_UNDISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_527", "TRIGSTR_528", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNPeasant.blp" )
    set udg_villagerQuest = GetLastCreatedQuestBJ()
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, gg_unit_n01D_0063 )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_LOcg_1274, true )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_initQuests takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_initQuests = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_initQuests, function Trig_initQuests_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setDifficulty
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setDifficulty_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ( 80.00 + ( I2R(udg_players) * 40.00 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_setDifficulty_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ( 34.00 + ( ( 4.00 * I2R(udg_players) ) + ( 4.00 * I2R(( udg_difficultyIndex + 1 )) ) ) ) )
    call SetPlayerHandicapDamageBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ( 90.00 + ( ( 3.00 * I2R(( udg_difficultyIndex + 1 )) ) + ( 2.50 * I2R(udg_players) ) ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_setDifficulty_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_setDifficulty_Func001A )
    call SetPlayerHandicapBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), ( 100.00 + ( ( 6.00 * I2R(udg_players) ) + ( 6.00 * I2R(( udg_difficultyIndex + 1 )) ) ) ) )
    call SetPlayerHandicapDamageBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), ( 80.00 + ( ( I2R(( udg_difficultyIndex + 1 )) * 2.50 ) + ( 2.50 * I2R(udg_players) ) ) ) )
    call ForForce( udg_enemyPlayers, function Trig_setDifficulty_Func004A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setDifficulty takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setDifficulty = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_setDifficulty, function Trig_setDifficulty_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build1
//===========================================================================
