function Trig_build1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[0] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[0], 'hwtw', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_tower1) )
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[1], 'hwtw', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_tower2) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build1, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build1, function Trig_build1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_build2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[0], 'n00B', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_equipment) )
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[1], 'n006', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bank) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build2, 80.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build2, function Trig_build2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_build3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[0], 'h002', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_barracks) )
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[1], 'n00D', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_basewg) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build3, 155.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build3, function Trig_build3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_build4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[0], 'h00X', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_baseMill) )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[1], "harvest", gg_dest_DTsh_1960 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build4 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build4, 240.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build4, function Trig_build4_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_build5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6775" )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bank)
    call PingMinimapLocForForceEx( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 10.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_FLASHY, 90.00, 90.00, 10.00 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build5, 160.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build5, 300.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build5, function Trig_build5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: build6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_build6_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[1], "harvest", gg_dest_DTsh_1960 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_build6 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_build6 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_build6, 330.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_build6, function Trig_build6_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: respawnHero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_respawnHero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_heros) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_respawnHero_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal < 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_respawnHero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 45.00, "TRIGSTR_911" )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, R2I(( I2R(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)) * 0.75 )) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, R2I(( I2R(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)) * 0.75 )) )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_heroSpawnStart)
    call ReviveHeroLoc( GetDyingUnit(), udg_tempPoint, true )
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0 )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetDyingUnit(), 70.00 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetDyingUnit(), 30.00 )
    set udg_foodCountReal = udg_foodCountReal - 1
    if ( Trig_respawnHero_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_foodCountReal = 0.00
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_respawnHero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_respawnHero = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_respawnHero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_respawnHero, Condition( function Trig_respawnHero_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_respawnHero, function Trig_respawnHero_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: selectHero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_selectHero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectHero_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_tempUnit) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectHero_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_tempUnit) == 'E008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectHero_Func022A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayer, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_tempPlayer, GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_tempPlayer, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_tempPlayer )
endfunction

function Trig_selectHero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPlayer = GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ( udg_tempPlayer, GetEntireMapRect() )
    set udg_selected_unit = GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_heroSpawnStart)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, GetUnitTypeId(udg_selected_unit), udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempUnit = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_heros )
    set udg_heroArray[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] = udg_tempUnit
    call ExplodeUnitBJ( udg_selected_unit )
    call ExplodeUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( 'I00M', udg_tempUnit )
    call SetItemCharges( GetLastCreatedItem(), 5 )
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( 'I00O', udg_tempUnit )
    call SetItemCharges( GetLastCreatedItem(), 5 )
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( 'I02A', udg_tempUnit )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A07I', udg_tempUnit )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( udg_tempUnit, 'A07I', true )
    if ( Trig_selectHero_Func020C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_lightninggroup )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_selectHero_Func021C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_poisongroup )
    else
    endif
    call ForForce( udg_visionGroup, function Trig_selectHero_Func022A )
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( udg_tempPlayer, udg_visionGroup )
    call DestroyFogModifier( udg_vis[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] )
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ( true, udg_tempPlayer, FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_heroarea )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_npc, udg_tempPlayer, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_tempPlayer, udg_npc, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_npc, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_tempPlayer )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_tempPlayer, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_npc )
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( udg_tempPlayer, GetUnitLoc(udg_tempUnit), 0 )
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( udg_tempUnit, udg_tempPlayer )
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob, 80.00, GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    set udg_heroSelected[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] = true
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setDifficulty )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_selectHero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_selectHero = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_selectHero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_selectHero, Condition( function Trig_selectHero_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_selectHero, function Trig_selectHero_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: selectRandomHero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_selectRandomHero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnteringUnit()) == 'nrac' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectRandomHero_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_tempUnit) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectRandomHero_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_tempUnit) == 'E008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectRandomHero_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(udg_tempUnit)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_selectRandomHero_Func020A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayer, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_tempPlayer, GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_tempPlayer, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_tempPlayer )
endfunction

function Trig_selectRandomHero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPlayer = GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ( udg_tempPlayer, GetEntireMapRect() )
    set udg_selected_unit = GetEnteringUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_heroSpawnStart)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_herotypes[GetRandomInt(0, 8)], udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempUnit = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_heros )
    set udg_heroArray[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] = udg_tempUnit
    call ExplodeUnitBJ( udg_selected_unit )
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 250, udg_tempPlayer, PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A07I', udg_tempUnit )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( udg_tempUnit, 'A07I', true )
    set udg_heroArray[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] = udg_tempUnit
    if ( Trig_selectRandomHero_Func017C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_lightninggroup )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_selectRandomHero_Func018C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_poisongroup )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_selectRandomHero_Func019C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_compUnits )
    else
    endif
    call ForForce( udg_visionGroup, function Trig_selectRandomHero_Func020A )
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( udg_tempPlayer, udg_visionGroup )
    call DestroyFogModifier( udg_vis[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] )
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ( true, udg_tempPlayer, FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_heroarea )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_npc, udg_tempPlayer, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_tempPlayer, udg_npc, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_npc, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_tempPlayer )
    call SetPlayerAllianceBJ( udg_tempPlayer, ALLIANCE_SHARED_VISION, true, udg_npc )
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( udg_tempPlayer, GetUnitLoc(udg_tempUnit), 0 )
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( udg_tempUnit, udg_tempPlayer )
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob, 80.00, GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    set udg_heroSelected[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] = true
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setDifficulty )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_selectRandomHero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_selectRandomHero = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_selectRandomHero, gg_rct_randomhero )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_selectRandomHero, Condition( function Trig_selectRandomHero_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_selectRandomHero, function Trig_selectRandomHero_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: attackGate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_attackGate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsDestructableAliveBJ(gg_dest_LTg1_14741) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attackGate_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", gg_dest_LTg1_14741 )
endfunction

function Trig_attackGate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_attackGateRegion)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_attackGate_Func002A )
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_attackGate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_attackGate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_attackGate, 5.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_attackGate, Condition( function Trig_attackGate_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_attackGate, function Trig_attackGate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: stopAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_stopAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_attackGate )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_stopAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_stopAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( gg_trg_stopAttack, gg_dest_LTg1_14741 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_stopAttack, function Trig_stopAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBad
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing

		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(10, 'u00E', gg_rct_Aspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 8) then
			call spawnBC(10, 'u00F', gg_rct_Aspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 9) then
			call spawnBC(10, 'u008', gg_rct_Aspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//archer
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n004', gg_rct_Aspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 8) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n003', gg_rct_Aspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 9) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n000', gg_rct_Aspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//mage
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(3, 'u00D', gg_rct_Aspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 8) then
			call spawnBC(3, 'u00C', gg_rct_Aspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 9) then
			call spawnBC(3, 'u007', gg_rct_Aspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//necro
		if (udg_enemypower >= 2 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'u00A', gg_rct_Aspawn4, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 8) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'u00B', gg_rct_Aspawn4, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'u009', gg_rct_Aspawn4, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//orc
		if (udg_enemypower >= 6 and udg_enemypower <= 8) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'n001', gg_rct_Aspawn5, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 9 and udg_enemypower <= 12) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'n005', gg_rct_Aspawn5, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 14) then
			call spawnBC(1, 'n002', gg_rct_Aspawn5, gg_rct_base)
		endif

endfunction


function InitTrig_spawnBad takes nothing returns nothing
	set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
	set gg_trg_spawnBad = CreateTrigger(  )
	call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnBad, 30.00 )
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBad, function Trig_spawn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBad2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enemyspawn2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_unp1_0139) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyspawn2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	if ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_forwardBase) == true ) then
		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_forwardBase)
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00F', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u008', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		endif

		//archer
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n004', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n003', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n000', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		endif

		//mage
		if (udg_enemypower >= 2 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u00D', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u00C', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u007', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		endif
	elseif ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_forwardBase) == false) then
		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_base)
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00F', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u008', gg_rct_Bspawn1, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//archer
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n004', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n003', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'n000', gg_rct_Bspawn2, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//mage
		if (udg_enemypower >= 2 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u00D', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u00C', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'u007', gg_rct_Bspawn3, gg_rct_base)
		endif
	endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnBad2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    set gg_trg_spawnBad2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnBad2, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_spawnBad2, Condition( function Trig_enemyspawn2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBad2, function Trig_enemyspawn2_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBad3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enemyspawn3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_enemyBase3) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyspawn3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	if ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_forwardBase) == true ) then
		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00F', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u008', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		endif

		//archer
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n004', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n003', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n000', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_forwardBase)
		endif
	elseif ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_forwardBase) == false) then
		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u00F', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(8, 'u008', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		endif

		//archer
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n004', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n003', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(2, 'n000', gg_rct_miniSpawn, gg_rct_base)
		endif
	endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnBad3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    set gg_trg_spawnBad3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnBad3, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_spawnBad3, Condition( function Trig_enemyspawn3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBad3, function Trig_enemyspawn3_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBad4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enemyspawn4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_enemyBase4) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyspawn4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
		//melee
		if (udg_enemypower >= 1 and udg_enemypower <= 3) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn2, gg_rct_base)
			call spawnBC(5, 'u00E', gg_rct_miniSpawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 4 and udg_enemypower <= 9) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'u00F', gg_rct_miniSpawn2, gg_rct_base)
		elseif (udg_enemypower >= 10) then
			call spawnBC(5, 'u008', gg_rct_miniSpawn2, gg_rct_base)
		endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnBad4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    set gg_trg_spawnBad4 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnBad4, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_spawnBad4, Condition( function Trig_enemyspawn4_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBad4, function Trig_enemyspawn4_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnGood
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawngood_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	//allies
	if (udg_buildSwordmen) then
		call spawnG(udg_footmanCount, 'hhes', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	else
		call spawnG(udg_footmanCount, 'hfoo', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	endif
	if (udg_buildRanger) then
		call spawnG(udg_archerCount, 'e000', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	else
		call spawnG(udg_archerCount, 'nhea', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	endif
	if (udg_buildHighPriest) then
		call spawnG(udg_priestCount, 'nchp', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	else
		call spawnG(udg_priestCount, 'hmpr', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	endif
	call spawnG(udg_knightCount, 'hkni', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
	call spawnG(udg_mortarCount, 'hmtm', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnGood takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawnGood = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnGood, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnGood, function Trig_spawngood_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnGoodOutpost
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawngoodAux_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_forwardBase) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawngoodAux_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	if ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_auxBase) == true ) then
		//allies
		if (udg_buildSwordmen) then
			call spawnG(udg_footmanCount/2 + 4, 'hhes', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_footmanCount/2, 'hfoo', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		endif
		if (udg_buildRanger) then
			call spawnG(udg_archerCount/2, 'e000', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_archerCount/2, 'nhea', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		endif
		if (udg_buildHighPriest) then
			call spawnG(udg_priestCount/2, 'nchp', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_priestCount/2, 'hmpr', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase2)
		endif
	else
		//allies
		if (udg_buildSwordmen) then
			call spawnG(udg_footmanCount/2  + 4, 'hhes', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_footmanCount/2, 'hfoo', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		endif
		if (udg_buildRanger) then
			call spawnG(udg_archerCount/2, 'e000', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_archerCount/2, 'nhea', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		endif
		if (udg_buildHighPriest) then
			call spawnG(udg_priestCount/2, 'nchp', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		else
			call spawnG(udg_priestCount/2, 'hmpr', gg_rct_forwardSpawn, gg_rct_enemybase)
		endif
	endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnGoodOutpost takes nothing returns nothing
	set gg_trg_spawnGoodOutpost = CreateTrigger(  )
	call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnGoodOutpost, 60.00 )
	call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_spawnGoodOutpost, Condition( function Trig_spawngoodAux_Conditions ) )
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnGoodOutpost, function Trig_spawngoodAux_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBadStart
//===========================================================================

function Trig_spawn_Actions_StartB takes nothing returns nothing
	call spawnB(30, 'u00E', gg_rct_enemystart, gg_rct_base)
	call spawnB(8, 'u00E', gg_rct_enemystart, gg_rct_base)
	call spawnB(5, 'n004', gg_rct_enemystart, gg_rct_base)
	call spawnB(3, 'u00D', gg_rct_enemystart, gg_rct_base)
endfunction

function InitTrig_spawnBadStart takes nothing returns nothing
	set gg_trg_spawnBadStart = CreateTrigger(  )
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBadStart, function Trig_spawn_Actions_StartB )
endfunction



//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnGoodStart
//===========================================================================

function Trig_spawn_Actions_StartG takes nothing returns nothing
	call spawnG(20, 'hfoo', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase2)
	call spawnG(10, 'nhea', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase2)
	call spawnG(5, 'hmpr', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase2)
endfunction

function InitTrig_spawnGoodStart takes nothing returns nothing
	set gg_trg_spawnGoodStart = CreateTrigger(  )
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnGoodStart, function Trig_spawn_Actions_StartG )
endfunction



//===========================================================================
// Trigger: summonDefender
//===========================================================================
function Trig_summonDefender_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6778" )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 30.00 )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroMountainKingWarcry1 )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_guardianSpawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H007', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000 + udg_enemypower * 1000 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_hero = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( udg_hero, ( udg_enemypower * 5 ), false )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A003', GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( udg_enemypower * 2 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A005', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A005', GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( udg_enemypower * 2 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A046', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_attributeBonus )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 100.00 )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_Doom )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_BloodElfTheme )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_summonDefender takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_summonDefender = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_summonDefender, function Trig_summonDefender_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: summonShopkeeper
//===========================================================================
function Trig_summonShopkeeper_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_7447" )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 30.00 )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroTinkerYes4 )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_shopKeeperArea)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'N018', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000 + udg_enemypower * 1000 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_shopKeeper = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( udg_shopKeeper, ( udg_enemypower * 6 ), false )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05Z', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05Y', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_attributeBonus )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroAttack )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroDeath )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 100.00 )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_summonShopkeeper takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_summonShopkeeper = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_summonShopkeeper, function Trig_summonShopkeeper_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: summonGuardian
//===========================================================================
function Trig_summonGuardian_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6779" )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_ShandrisPissed2 )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_guardianSpawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00B', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000 + udg_enemypower * 1000 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_guardian = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_summonGuardian takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_summonGuardian = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_summonGuardian, function Trig_summonGuardian_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnHero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawnHero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) <= udg_heroSpawnChance ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnHero_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnHero_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnHero_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnHero_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnHero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 30.00 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6780" )
    set udg_tempInt = GetRandomInt(1, 4)
    if ( Trig_spawnHero_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawnHero_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed2 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawnHero_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed3 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawnHero_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroPaladinPissed6 )
    else
    endif
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_heroSpawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H011', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000 + udg_enemypower * 1000 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( udg_enemypower * 2 ), false )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A044', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A044', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_enemypower )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A045', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A045', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_enemypower )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A048', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A048', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_enemypower )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_attributeBonus )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_goodgroup )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_enemybase)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 100.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnHero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawnHero = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_spawnHero, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_spawnHero, Condition( function Trig_spawnHero_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnHero, function Trig_spawnHero_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnBoss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawnBoss_Func020Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_bossCrit < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnBoss_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemypower >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnBoss_Func021Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_bossEvasion < 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnBoss_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemypower > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnBoss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossspawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_bosses[GetRandomInt(0, 22)], udg_enemy, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_difficultyRatio = ((udg_enemypower+1) * 2.0 * (udg_players+1) * 0.25 * (udg_difficultyIndex+1) * 1.25)*0.05
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bossgroup )
    set udg_babi = GetRandomInt(0, 20)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_bossabilities[udg_babi], GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( udg_bossabilities[udg_babi], GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( udg_enemypower + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 500 + R2I(( udg_difficultyRatio * 300.00 )) ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 300 + R2I(( udg_difficultyRatio * 20.00 )) ) )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( ( 400.00 + I2R(( udg_enemypower * 5 )) ) + ( I2R(( udg_difficultyIndex + 1 )) * 10.00 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 2.00 - ( I2R(udg_difficultyIndex) * 0.10 ) ), 1 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 10 + R2I(( udg_difficultyRatio * 1.50 )) ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( ( 5.00 + udg_difficultyRatio ) * 0.80 ) )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), R2I(( udg_difficultyRatio * 2.00 )), false )
    if ( Trig_spawnBoss_Func020C() ) then
        if ( Trig_spawnBoss_Func020Func001C() ) then
            set udg_bossCrit = ( udg_bossCrit + 1 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawnBoss_Func021C() ) then
        if ( Trig_spawnBoss_Func021Func001C() ) then
            set udg_bossEvasion = ( udg_bossEvasion + 1 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A06D', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bossCrit )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A06C', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bossEvasion )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base)
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ( false, GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_bossMessage )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnBoss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawnBoss = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_spawnBoss, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnBoss, function Trig_spawnBoss_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bossMessage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bossMessage_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetAttacker(), udg_bossgroup) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), udg_bossgroup) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_bossMessage_Func012C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitShareVisionBJ( true, GetAttacker(), GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempInt == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bossMessage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_bossMessage_Func001A )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 30.00 )
    set udg_tempInt = GetRandomInt(1, 8)
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroDreadlordWarcry1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6791" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6792" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed2 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6793" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_NecromancerPissed3 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6794" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func008C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroLichPissed5 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6795" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func009C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroLichPissed7 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6796" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func010C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroLichPissed8 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6797" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bossMessage_Func011C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_DeathKnightPissed2 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6798" )
    else
    endif
    set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    call PingMinimapLocForForceEx( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_ATTACK, 100, 100, 100 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call SetMusicVolumeBJ( 100.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bossMessage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bossMessage = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_bossMessage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_bossMessage, Condition( function Trig_bossMessage_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bossMessage, function Trig_bossMessage_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnCagedUnits
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawnCagedUnits_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 4) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawnCagedUnits_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_spawnCagedUnits_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_Rescue )
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = GetRandomInt(3, 8)
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_bspawnp = GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_goodunits[GetRandomInt(0, 5)], udg_npc, udg_bspawnp, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_bspawnp)
        set udg_bspawnp = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_enemybase)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_bspawnp )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_goodgroup )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_bspawnp)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnCagedUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDestDeathInRegionEvent( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, gg_rct_cage5 )
    call TriggerRegisterDestDeathInRegionEvent( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, gg_rct_cage4 )
    call TriggerRegisterDestDeathInRegionEvent( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, gg_rct_cage3 )
    call TriggerRegisterDestDeathInRegionEvent( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, gg_rct_cage2 )
    call TriggerRegisterDestDeathInRegionEvent( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, gg_rct_cage1 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnCagedUnits, function Trig_spawnCagedUnits_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: firstWaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_firstWaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBadStart )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_firstWaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_firstWaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_firstWaves, 100.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_firstWaves, 75.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_firstWaves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_firstWaves, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_firstWaves, function Trig_firstWaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: firstGoodWave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_firstGoodWave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnGoodStart )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_firstGoodWave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_firstGoodWave = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_firstGoodWave, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_firstGoodWave, function Trig_firstGoodWave_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawnFinalBattle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawnFinalBattle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ( false, GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ() )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6767" )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00M', udg_npc, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_humanityspawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_attributeBonus )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06U', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( udg_enemypower * 4 ), false )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_KnightWarcry1 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_finalBattleComplete )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawnFinalBattle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawnFinalBattle = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnFinalBattle )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_spawnFinalBattle, udg_battletimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_spawnFinalBattle, function Trig_spawnFinalBattle_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: flowerSpawnSkeletons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_flowerSpawnSkeletons_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == gg_item_gold_0202 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_flowerSpawnSkeletons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.70 )
    call ExplodeUnitBJ( gg_unit_nvil_0199 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.70 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 7
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_flowerSkeletons)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00E', udg_enemy, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl" )
        set udg_effects[udg_effectCounter] = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        set udg_effectCounter = ( udg_effectCounter + 1 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_effectDestroyTimer, false, 2.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_flowerSpawnSkeletons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_flowerSpawnSkeletons = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_flowerSpawnSkeletons, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_flowerSpawnSkeletons, Condition( function Trig_flowerSpawnSkeletons_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_flowerSpawnSkeletons, function Trig_flowerSpawnSkeletons_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: largeWaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_largeWaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBad )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_largeWaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_largeWaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_largeWaves, 1000.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_largeWaves, function Trig_largeWaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: buildLumberMill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_buildLumberMill_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSellingUnit() == gg_unit_h00J_0028 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_buildLumberMill_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSellingUnit() == gg_unit_h00J_0031 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_buildLumberMill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_buildLumberMill_Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( GetSellingUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_peasant[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[2], 'h00K', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_lum1) )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_lumberTimer1, false, 400.00 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_lumberHarvest1 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_setLumberMill1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6799" )
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_lum1)
        call PingMinimapLocForForceEx( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_FLASHY, 10.00, 10.00, 100 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_buildLumberMill_Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( GetSellingUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_peasant[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[4], 'h00K', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_lum2) )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_lumberTimer2, false, 300.00 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_lumberHarvest2 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_setLumberMill2 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6800" )
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_lum1)
        call PingMinimapLocForForceEx( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_FLASHY, 10.00, 10.00, 100 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_buildLumberMill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_buildLumberMill = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_buildLumberMill, function Trig_buildLumberMill_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lumberHarvest1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lumberHarvest1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[2], "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectSimpleBJ(gg_rct_lumarea) )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[3], "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectSimpleBJ(gg_rct_lumarea) )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "A lumber mill has been constructed. Wood income has been upgraded to: +" + I2S(udg_lumber) ) )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lumberHarvest1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lumberHarvest1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_lumberHarvest1, udg_lumberTimer1 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lumberHarvest1, function Trig_lumberHarvest1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lumberHarvest2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lumberHarvest2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[4], "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectSimpleBJ(gg_rct_lumarea2) )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( udg_peasant[5], "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectSimpleBJ(gg_rct_lumarea2) )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "A lumber mill has been constructed. Wood income has been upgraded to: +" + I2S(udg_lumber) ) )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lumberHarvest2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lumberHarvest2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_lumberHarvest2, udg_lumberTimer2 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lumberHarvest2, function Trig_lumberHarvest2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setLumberMill1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setLumberMill1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetConstructingStructure()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setLumberMill1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_lumbermill = GetConstructingStructure()
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setLumberMill1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setLumberMill1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_setLumberMill1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_setLumberMill1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_START )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_setLumberMill1, Condition( function Trig_setLumberMill1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_setLumberMill1, function Trig_setLumberMill1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setLumberMill2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setLumberMill2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetConstructingStructure()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setLumberMill2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_lumbermil2 = GetConstructingStructure()
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setLumberMill2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setLumberMill2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_setLumberMill2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_setLumberMill2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_START )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_setLumberMill2, Condition( function Trig_setLumberMill2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_setLumberMill2, function Trig_setLumberMill2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: income
//===========================================================================
function Trig_income_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_foodIncome )
    call addGold( udg_income )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
    call addLumber( udg_lumber )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_income takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_income = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_income, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_income, function Trig_income_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setLumber
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setLumber_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_lumbermill) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setLumber_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_lumbermil2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setLumber_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_lumber = udg_lumberIncome
    if ( Trig_setLumber_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_lumber = ( udg_lumber + udg_lumberIncome )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_setLumber_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_lumber = ( udg_lumber + udg_lumberIncome )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setLumber takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setLumber = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_setLumber, function Trig_setLumber_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: foodIncome
//===========================================================================
function Trig_foodIncome_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal < 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_foodIncome_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > udg_maxFood ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_foodIncome_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_foodCountReal = udg_foodCountReal * (1 + udg_interestRate/100)
    if ( Trig_foodIncome_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_foodCountReal = 0.00
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_foodIncome_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_foodCountReal = I2R(udg_maxFood)
        call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, ( "Food production has been capped. Increase maximum food to resume production." + "" ) )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_foodIncome takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_foodIncome = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_foodIncome, function Trig_foodIncome_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setFood
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setFood_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_foodCount = R2I(udg_foodCountReal)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_foodCount )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setFood takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setFood = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_setFood, function Trig_setFood_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeMain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeMain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeBuildings )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnits )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_buildLumberMill )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeTown )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeAbilities )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_townHallItems )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeResource )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeWaygates )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTechItem )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeMain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeMain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_upgradeMain, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeMain, function Trig_upgradeMain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeBuildings
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I01L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_CastleWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call RemoveUnit( GetSellingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6724" )
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_forwardBase)
        call PingMinimapLocForForceEx( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_FLASHY, 10.00, 10.00, 100 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_buildForwardBase )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func002C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GuardTowerWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'hgtw', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GuardTowerWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'hatw', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GuardTowerWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'hctw', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_GuardTowerWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6725" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'nft1', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_FrostmourneDeath, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6726" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'ndt2', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_RollingThunder1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00W', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func008C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_RollingThunder1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h013', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func009C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_Marketplace, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6727" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n009', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        set udg_itemShop = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func010C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_Marketplace, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6728" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n008', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        set udg_itemShop = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func011C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_Cantina, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6729" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00C', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func012C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_Cantina, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6730" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00A', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeBuildings_Func013C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_Cantina, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6731" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeBuildings = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeBuildings, function Trig_upgradeBuildings_Actions )
endfunction
