//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeWaygates
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeWaygates_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I01W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeWaygates_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeWaygates_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_WayGateWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6732" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00E', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call WaygateSetDestinationLocBJ( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TPHOME) )
        call WaygateActivateBJ( true, GetLastReplacedUnitBJ() )
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeWaygates takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeWaygates = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeWaygates, function Trig_upgradeWaygates_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeAbilities
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I032' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I030' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func001C() ) then
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05D', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'AOcr', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05G', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06M', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06Q', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06P', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06R', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06S', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A03I', true )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03I', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A073', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_playerabilities[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))] = 'A02G'
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func002C() ) then
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05D', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'AOcr', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05G', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06M', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06Q', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06P', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06R', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06S', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A03I', true )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03I', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A073', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_playerabilities[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))] = 'A03G'
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func003C() ) then
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05D', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'AOcr', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05G', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06M', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06Q', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06P', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06R', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06S', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A03I', true )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03I', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A073', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_playerabilities[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))] = 'A03H'
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func004C() ) then
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05D', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'AOcr', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05G', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06M', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06Q', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06P', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06R', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06S', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A03I', true )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03I', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A073', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_playerabilities[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))] = 'A03J'
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeAbilities_Func005C() ) then
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05D', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'AOcr', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A05G', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06M', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06Q', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06P', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06R', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A06S', true )
        call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetBuyingUnit(), 'A03I', true )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03I', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03H', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03J', GetBuyingUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02G', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A073', GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_playerabilities[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))] = 'A073'
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeAbilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeAbilities = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeAbilities, function Trig_upgradeAbilities_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeResource
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeResource_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func007Func009003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetFilterDestructable()) == 'DTsh' )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func008Func009003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetFilterDestructable()) == 'DTsh' )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func010Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > udg_maxFood ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > udg_maxFood ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func012Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_income < 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > 49 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func013Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_income < 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > 49 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > 99 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func015Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) > 99 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeResource_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 5 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "The magic vault has been activated, gold income can now be upgraded at +5 gold every 60s. Current income is: " + udg_tempStr ) )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00Q', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func002C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 5 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 5 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 5 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 4 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'n00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcaneVaultWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_income = ( udg_income + 3 )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanLumberMillWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_lumberIncome = ( udg_lumberIncome + 2 )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_lumber*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2, udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00Y', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Wood income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_baseMill), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectBJ(gg_rct_lumareabase, Condition(function Trig_upgradeResource_Func007Func009003002)) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func008C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanLumberMillWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_lumberIncome = ( udg_lumberIncome + 2 )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_lumber*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2, udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00Z', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Wood income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_baseMill), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectBJ(gg_rct_lumareabase, Condition(function Trig_upgradeResource_Func008Func009003002)) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func009C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanLumberMillWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_lumberIncome = ( udg_lumberIncome + 2 )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setLumber )
        set udg_tempStr = I2S(udg_lumber*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2, udg_players))
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h010', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, ( "Wood income has been upgraded to: +" + udg_tempStr ) )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_baseMill), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", RandomDestructableInRectSimpleBJ(gg_rct_lumareabase) )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func010C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal + 10.00 )
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func010Func003C() ) then
            set udg_foodCountReal = I2R(udg_maxFood)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6734" )
        else
        endif
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func011C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_BundleOfLumber, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal + 10.00 )
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func011Func003C() ) then
            set udg_foodCountReal = I2R(udg_maxFood)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6735" )
        else
        endif
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func012C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func012Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 500 ) )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 50.00 )
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            set udg_interestRate = ( udg_interestRate - 1.00 )
            if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func012Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_interestRate = 1.00
            else
            endif
            return
        else
            set udg_tempPg = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPg, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6737" )
            call DestroyForce( udg_tempPg )
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func013C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func013Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_BundleOfLumber, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 50.00 )
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 100 ) )
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            set udg_interestRate = ( udg_interestRate - 1.00 )
            if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func013Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_interestRate = 1.00
            else
            endif
            return
        else
            set udg_tempPg = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPg, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6738" )
            call DestroyForce( udg_tempPg )
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func014C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func014Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 100.00 )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal * 0.90 )
            set udg_maxFood = ( udg_maxFood + 250 )
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, ( "The maximum food has been upgraded  to: +" + I2S(udg_maxFood) ) )
            return
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 100 ) )
            set udg_tempPg = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPg, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6739" )
            call DestroyForce( udg_tempPg )
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func015C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeResource_Func015Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_interestRate = ( udg_interestRate + 10.00 )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 100.00 )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal * 0.90 )
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, ( "The Interest rate has been increased to: +" + ( R2S(udg_interestRate) + "%" ) ) )
            return
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 150 ) )
            set udg_tempPg = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPg, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6740" )
            call DestroyForce( udg_tempPg )
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeResource takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeResource = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeResource, function Trig_upgradeResource_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeTown
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeTown_Func001Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Func002Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Func003Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeTown_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeTown_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount + 2
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6741" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'hkee', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_base = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhac', 1, udg_npc )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(udg_npc)
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_upgradeTown_Func001Func010A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeTown_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount + 1
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6742" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'hcas', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_base = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhac', 2, udg_npc )
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_archerArea)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00D', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(udg_npc)
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_upgradeTown_Func002Func013A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeTown_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_baseMaxed = true
        set udg_priestCount = udg_priestCount + 1
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_KnightUpgradeComplete1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6744" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h009', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_base = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhac', 3, udg_npc )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I033', udg_base, 1, 1 )
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(udg_npc)
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_upgradeTown_Func003Func012A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeTown takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeTown = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeTown, function Trig_upgradeTown_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeUnits
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_heroSpawnChance <= 95 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I03M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001Func004001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) == GetFilterPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( ( udg_footmanCount + udg_archerCount ) + ( udg_knightCount + ( udg_mortarCount + udg_priestCount ) ) ) >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I007' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( ( udg_footmanCount + udg_archerCount ) + ( udg_knightCount + ( udg_mortarCount + udg_priestCount ) ) ) >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( ( udg_footmanCount + udg_archerCount ) + ( udg_knightCount + ( udg_mortarCount + udg_priestCount ) ) ) >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I006' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( ( udg_footmanCount + udg_archerCount ) + ( udg_knightCount + ( udg_mortarCount + udg_priestCount ) ) ) >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( ( udg_footmanCount + udg_archerCount ) + ( udg_knightCount + ( udg_mortarCount + udg_priestCount ) ) ) >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(udg_foodCountReal) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I01X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnits_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_KnightNoRiderYes2, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_horsearea2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01A', GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func002C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HeroPaladinReady1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_heroSpawnChance = udg_heroSpawnChance+5
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_FootmanReady1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 1.00 )
            set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount + 1
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001Func007C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'h014', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            return
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 40 ) )
            call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_upgradeUnits_Func003Func001Func004001001)), "TRIGSTR_5544" )
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_ArcherReady1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 1.00 )
            set udg_archerCount = udg_archerCount + 1
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func004Func001Func007C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'h014', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            return
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 55 ) )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit())), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6745" )
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_PriestReady1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 1.00 )
            set udg_priestCount = udg_priestCount + 1
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func005Func001Func007C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'h014', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
            return
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 75 ) )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit())), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6746" )
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_KnightReady1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 5.00 )
            set udg_knightCount = udg_knightCount + 1
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func006Func001Func006C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h014', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
        else
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit())), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6747" )
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 100 ) )
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007C() ) then
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_MortarTeamWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
            set udg_foodCountReal = ( udg_foodCountReal - 5.00 )
            set udg_mortarCount = udg_mortarCount + 1
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func007Func001Func007C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h014', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
            call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
        else
            call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) + 150 ) )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit())), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6748" )
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func008C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanBarracksWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6749" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        set udg_heroSpawnChance = udg_heroSpawnChance+5
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func009C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanBarracksWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6750" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h001', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount + 2
        set udg_archerCount = udg_archerCount + 1
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func010C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanBarracksWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6751" )
        set udg_buildSwordmen = true
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00B', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func011C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanBarracksWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_buildRanger = true
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6752" )
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00E', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func012C() ) then
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_HumanBarracksWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
        set udg_buildHighPriest = true
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetSellingUnit(), 'h00F', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6753" )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnits_Func013C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6754" )
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack2 )
        call spawnG(20, 'hmtt', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeUnits = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeUnits, function Trig_upgradeUnits_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeUnitTech
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeUnitTech_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhan', udg_upgradeLevel, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhar', udg_upgradeLevel, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhme', udg_upgradeLevel, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Reib', udg_upgradeLevel, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Remk', udg_upgradeLevel, GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTech_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_upgradeLevel = ( udg_upgradeLevel + 1 )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhme', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhpt', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhar', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhla', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Reib', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Remk', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Resm', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhra', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Rhan', udg_upgradeLevel, udg_npc )
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_upgradeUnitTech_Func011A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeUnitTech takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech, function Trig_upgradeUnitTech_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: upgradeUnitTechItem
//===========================================================================
function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I033' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04U' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04V' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_upgradeLevel <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_upgradeLevel <= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_upgradeLevel <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_BlacksmithWhat1, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTech )
    if ( Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003C() ) then
        call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I033', udg_base, 1, 1 )
    else
        call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I033', udg_base )
        if ( Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04T', udg_base, 1, 1 )
        else
            call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04T', udg_base )
            if ( Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04U', udg_base, 1, 1 )
            else
                call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04U', udg_base )
                call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04V', udg_base, 1, 1 )
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_upgradeUnitTechItem takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_upgradeUnitTechItem = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTechItem, Condition( function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_upgradeUnitTechItem, function Trig_upgradeUnitTechItem_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: miscItems
//===========================================================================
function Trig_miscItems_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 20) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 20) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 20) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_miscItems_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 200 ) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_7894" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 400 ) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6719" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6720" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc( 'I036', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_097) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6721" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc( 'I03T', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_097) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6722" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func007C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetManipulatingUnit(), R2I(( I2R(BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetManipulatingUnit())) * 0.90 )) )
        call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()), ( GetPlayerHandicapXPBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit())) + 40.00 ) )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6723" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_miscItems_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc( udg_randomItems[GetRandomInt(0, 24)], GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ItemShopRegion) )
        call UnitAddItemSwapped( GetLastCreatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_miscItems takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_miscItems = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_miscItems, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_miscItems, function Trig_miscItems_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: townHallItems
//===========================================================================
function Trig_townHallItems_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I021' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I022' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I023' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_guardian) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_shopKeeper) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', GetEnumUnit(), udg_attributeBonus )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetEnumUnit(), 'A01X', false )
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I02Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_townHallItems_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func001C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6755" )
        call spawnG(15, 'h005', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func002C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6756" )
        call spawnG(25, 'h005', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6757" )
        call spawnG(40, 'h005', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HumanCallToArmsWhat1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6758" )
        call spawnG(60, 'h005', gg_rct_base, gg_rct_enemybase)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_ItemReceived )
        set udg_attributeBonus = ( udg_attributeBonus + 1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6760" )
        if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func005C() ) then
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', udg_hero, udg_attributeBonus )
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', udg_guardian, udg_attributeBonus )
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func007C() ) then
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01X', udg_shopKeeper, udg_attributeBonus )
        else
        endif
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_townHallItems_Func005Func008A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_townHallItems_Func006C() ) then
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), 0 )
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetBuyingUnit()), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2050.00, 0 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_townHallItems takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_townHallItems = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_townHallItems, function Trig_townHallItems_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: annihilationShopRockGolem
//===========================================================================
function Trig_annihilationShopRockGolem_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I03X', gg_unit_n017_0275, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'esaz', gg_unit_n017_0275, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I035', gg_unit_n017_0275, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'kgal', gg_unit_n017_0275, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I05G', gg_unit_n017_0275, 1, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_annihilationShopRockGolem takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_annihilationShopRockGolem = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_annihilationShopRockGolem, gg_unit_nggr_0056, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_annihilationShopRockGolem, function Trig_annihilationShopRockGolem_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: annihilationShopCentaur
//===========================================================================
function Trig_annihilationShopCentaur_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04N', gg_unit_n017_0272, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I01O', gg_unit_n017_0272, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I05I', gg_unit_n017_0272, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'ward', gg_unit_n017_0272, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I042', gg_unit_n017_0272, 1, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I01R', gg_unit_n017_0273, 1, 1 )

    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I047', gg_unit_n017_0273, 1, 1 )
endfunction

    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I040', gg_unit_n017_0274, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I05H', gg_unit_n017_0274, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'totw', gg_unit_n017_0274, 1, 1 )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bookOfLearningAdd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bookOfLearningAdd_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I03W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bookOfLearningAdd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()), ( GetPlayerHandicapXPBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit())) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction
