    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_bookOfLearningAdd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_bookOfLearningAdd, Condition( function Trig_bookOfLearningAdd_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bookOfLearningAdd, function Trig_bookOfLearningAdd_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bookOfLearningRemove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bookOfLearningRemove_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I03W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bookOfLearningRemove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()), ( GetPlayerHandicapXPBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit())) - 50.00 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bookOfLearningRemove takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bookOfLearningRemove = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_bookOfLearningRemove, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_bookOfLearningRemove, Condition( function Trig_bookOfLearningRemove_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bookOfLearningRemove, function Trig_bookOfLearningRemove_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemGenerator
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemGenerator_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I049')) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04A')) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04B')) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_itemGenerator_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_tempBool == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempBool = false
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_itemGenerator1 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_itemGenerator2 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_itemGenerator3 )
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator_Func005C() ) then
        call RemoveItem( GetManipulatedItem() )
        call RemoveItem( udg_tempItem )
        set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( udg_newItem, GetManipulatingUnit() )
        set udg_tempStr = GetItemName(GetLastCreatedItem())
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "Your item has grown into: |c00AA0000" + ( udg_tempStr + "!|r" ) ) )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemGenerator takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemGenerator = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemGenerator, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_itemGenerator, Condition( function Trig_itemGenerator_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemGenerator, function Trig_itemGenerator_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemGenerator1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemGenerator1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I049')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator1_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator1_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator1_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempItem = GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I049')
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator1_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04C'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator1_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04I'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator1_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04L'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator1_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04F'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemGenerator1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemGenerator1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemGenerator1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_itemGenerator1, Condition( function Trig_itemGenerator1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemGenerator1, function Trig_itemGenerator1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemGenerator2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemGenerator2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04A')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator2_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator2_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator2_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator2_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I019' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempItem = GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04A')
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator2_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04D'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator2_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04J'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator2_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04M'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator2_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04G'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemGenerator2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemGenerator2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemGenerator2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_itemGenerator2, Condition( function Trig_itemGenerator2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemGenerator2, function Trig_itemGenerator2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemGenerator3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemGenerator3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04B')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I013' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemGenerator3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempItem = GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I04B')
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator3_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04E'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator3_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04K'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator3_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04P'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator3_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04H'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_itemGenerator3_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_newItem = 'I04S'
        set udg_tempBool = true
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemGenerator3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemGenerator3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemGenerator3, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_itemGenerator3, Condition( function Trig_itemGenerator3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemGenerator3, function Trig_itemGenerator3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: axeOfAnnihilation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_axeOfAnnihilation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetLevelingUnit(), 'I04C')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_axeOfAnnihilation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetLevelingUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_axeOfAnnihilation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_axeOfAnnihilation = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_axeOfAnnihilation, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_axeOfAnnihilation, Condition( function Trig_axeOfAnnihilation_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_axeOfAnnihilation, function Trig_axeOfAnnihilation_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bowOfTheBastard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bowOfTheBastard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetLevelingUnit(), 'I04F')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bowOfTheBastard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetLevelingUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bowOfTheBastard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bowOfTheBastard = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_bowOfTheBastard, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_bowOfTheBastard, Condition( function Trig_bowOfTheBastard_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bowOfTheBastard, function Trig_bowOfTheBastard_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: enchantingGloves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enchantingGloves_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetLevelingUnit(), 'I04I')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enchantingGloves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetLevelingUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_enchantingGloves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_enchantingGloves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_enchantingGloves, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_enchantingGloves, Condition( function Trig_enchantingGloves_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_enchantingGloves, function Trig_enchantingGloves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: happyHelm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_happyHelm_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetLevelingUnit(), 'I04L')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_happyHelm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLevelingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLevelingUnit()) + 50 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_happyHelm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_happyHelm = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_happyHelm, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_happyHelm, Condition( function Trig_happyHelm_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_happyHelm, function Trig_happyHelm_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: skeletalHelm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_skeletalHelm_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetLevelingUnit(), 'I04M')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_skeletalHelm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetLevelingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLevelingUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_skeletalHelm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_skeletalHelm = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_skeletalHelm, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_skeletalHelm, Condition( function Trig_skeletalHelm_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_skeletalHelm, function Trig_skeletalHelm_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: glovesOfMurder
//===========================================================================
function Trig_glovesOfMurder_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I04J')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_glovesOfMurder_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 1000) <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_glovesOfMurder_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_glovesOfMurder_Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 1) + 10 ), 1 )
        set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "You have gained |c00AA0000+10 Damage|r from Gloves of Murder" + "" ) )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_glovesOfMurder takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_glovesOfMurder = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_glovesOfMurder, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_glovesOfMurder, Condition( function Trig_glovesOfMurder_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_glovesOfMurder, function Trig_glovesOfMurder_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ultimateVampireClaws
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02H')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02L')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_newItem = 'I01P'
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02H') )
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02L') )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( udg_newItem, GetManipulatingUnit() )
    set udg_tempStr = GetItemName(GetLastCreatedItem())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "Your items have combined to create: |c00AA0000" + ( udg_tempStr + "!|r" ) ) )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ultimateVampireClaws takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ultimateVampireClaws = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_ultimateVampireClaws, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ultimateVampireClaws, Condition( function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ultimateVampireClaws, function Trig_ultimateVampireClaws_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ringOfRedemption
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02I')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01N')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_ringOfRedemption_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_newItem = 'I04O'
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01N') )
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02I') )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( udg_newItem, GetManipulatingUnit() )
    set udg_tempStr = GetItemName(GetLastCreatedItem())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "Your items have combined to create: |c00AA0000" + ( udg_tempStr + "!|r" ) ) )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ringOfRedemption takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ringOfRedemption = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_ringOfRedemption, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ringOfRedemption, Condition( function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ringOfRedemption, function Trig_ringOfRedemption_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: orbOfAnnihilation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02J')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02V')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_newItem = 'I04Q'
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02V') )
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02J') )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( udg_newItem, GetManipulatingUnit() )
    set udg_tempStr = GetItemName(GetLastCreatedItem())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "Your items have combined to create: |c00AA0000" + ( udg_tempStr + "!|r" ) ) )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_orbOfAnnihilation = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_orbOfAnnihilation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_orbOfAnnihilation, Condition( function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_orbOfAnnihilation, function Trig_orbOfAnnihilation_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: axeOfGlory
//===========================================================================
function Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02H')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I027' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I027')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_axeOfGlory_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_axeOfGlory_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_axeOfGlory_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_newItem = 'I04R'
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02H') )
    call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I027') )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( udg_newItem, GetManipulatingUnit() )
    set udg_tempStr = GetItemName(GetLastCreatedItem())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "Your items have combined to create: |c00AA0000" + ( udg_tempStr + "!|r" ) ) )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_axeOfGlory = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_axeOfGlory, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_axeOfGlory, Condition( function Trig_axeOfGlory_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_axeOfGlory, function Trig_axeOfGlory_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: summonHint
//===========================================================================
function Trig_summonHint_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit())) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) == 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_summonHint_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_1022" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_summonHint takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_summonHint = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_summonHint, gg_rct_outpost2 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_summonHint, Condition( function Trig_summonHint_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_summonHint, function Trig_summonHint_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: summon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_summon_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I036' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_summon_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I03T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_summon_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_summon_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_summon_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_hasKey[0] = true
    else
        call RemoveItem( GetEnumItem() )
    endif
    if ( Trig_summon_Func001Func002C() ) then
        set udg_hasKey[1] = true
    else
        call RemoveItem( GetEnumItem() )
    endif
    if ( Trig_summon_Func001Func003C() ) then
        set udg_hasKey[2] = true
    else
        call RemoveItem( GetEnumItem() )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_summon_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_hasKey[0] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_hasKey[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_hasKey[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_summon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ( gg_rct_outpost2, function Trig_summon_Func001A )
    if ( Trig_summon_Func002C() ) then
        call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_gateQuest, true )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I048', udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateItemLoc( 'gold', udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateItemLoc( 'tstr', udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateItemLoc( 'tint', udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateItemLoc( 'tdex', udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost2)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_summon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_summon = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_summon, function Trig_summon_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: villagersQuestCreate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_villagersQuestCreate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, gg_unit_n01D_0063 )
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "overhead", gg_unit_n01D_0063, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\TalkToMe\\TalkToMe.mdl" )
    set udg_villagerQuestMark = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_villagersQuestCreate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_villagersQuestCreate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_villagersQuestCreate, 600.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_villagersQuestCreate, function Trig_villagersQuestCreate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: villagerQuestFound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_villagerQuestFound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_villagerQuestFound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_villagerQuestMark )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_CaptainPissed1 )
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_villagerQuest, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_526" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nvil', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_villagerGroup )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nvl2', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_villagerGroup )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nvlw', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_villagerGroup )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nvil', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_villagerGroup )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_villagerQuestFound takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_villagerQuestFound = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_villagerQuestFound, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_villagerQuestFound, Condition( function Trig_villagerQuestFound_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_villagerQuestFound, function Trig_villagerQuestFound_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: villagerQuestComplete
//===========================================================================
function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_villagerQuestComplete == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit())) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ExplodeUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_villagerQuestComplete = true
    call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_villagerQuest, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_COMPLETED, "TRIGSTR_549" )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_H03VillagerM44 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'lmbr', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'gold', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'I03W', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'tst2', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    else
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'I01O', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateItemLoc( 'tin2', udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 8.00 )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u009', udg_enemy, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_NecromancerYesAttack2 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_villagerGroup, function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Func015A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 7
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00F', udg_enemy, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl" )
        set udg_effects[udg_effectCounter] = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        set udg_effectCounter = ( udg_effectCounter + 1 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_effectDestroyTimer, false, 2.00 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_NecromancerYesAttack3 )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 20
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_outpost4)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00F', udg_enemy, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_villagersQuest)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_villagerQuestComplete takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete, gg_rct_villagersQuest )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete, Condition( function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_villagerQuestComplete, function Trig_villagerQuestComplete_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: captainJackComplete
//===========================================================================
function Trig_captainJackComplete_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_captainJack, true )
    call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_captainJack, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_COMPLETED, "TRIGSTR_256" )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_captainJackSpawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o003', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'A078', true )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_HeroBladeMasterPissed2 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_captainJackQuestMark )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_captainJackComplete takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_captainJackComplete = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( gg_trg_captainJackComplete, gg_dest_LOcg_1274 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_captainJackComplete, function Trig_captainJackComplete_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: captainJackQuestMark
//===========================================================================
function Trig_captainJackQuestMark_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "overhead", gg_unit_h017_0111, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\TalkToMe\\TalkToMe.mdl" )
    set udg_captainJackMark = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_captainJackQuestMark takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_captainJackQuestMark = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_captainJackQuestMark, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_captainJackQuestMark, function Trig_captainJackQuestMark_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: captainJackFound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_captainJackFound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_captainJackFound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_captainJackMark )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_CaptainPissed1 )
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_captainJack, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_402" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( gg_dest_LOcg_1274, false )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_captainJackFound takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_captainJackFound = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_captainJackFound, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_captainJackFound, Condition( function Trig_captainJackFound_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_captainJackFound, function Trig_captainJackFound_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_surviveQuestFound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_surviveQuestMark )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_PriestWarcry1 )
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_defendQuest, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_410" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: mainQuestFound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_mainQuestFound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_493" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_mainquest, true )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_mainQuestFound, Condition( function Trig_mainQuestFound_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_mainQuestFound, function Trig_mainQuestFound_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: gateQuestFound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_gateQuestFound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_yellowGateQuest == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gateQuestFound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_yellowGateQuest = true
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_gateQuest, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_494" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_gateQuestFound = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_gateQuestFound, Condition( function Trig_gateQuestFound_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_gateQuestFound, function Trig_gateQuestFound_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: destroySecondaryBaseFound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest, true )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_destroySecondaryBaseFound takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound, gg_rct_qo1 )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound, gg_rct_qo2 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound, Condition( function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFound_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound, function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFound_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander
//===========================================================================
function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFound )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_secondBaseQuestMark )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_MortarTeamPissed3 )
    call QuestSetDiscoveredBJ( udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest, true )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_513" )
    call FlashQuestDialogButtonBJ(  )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander, Condition( function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander, function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseFoundCommander_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: secretShopComplete
//===========================================================================
function Trig_secretShopComplete_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsQuestCompleted(udg_gateQuest) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_secretShopComplete_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_SecretFound )
    call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_gateQuest, true )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 30, "TRIGSTR_195" )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_secretShopComplete takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_secretShopComplete = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_secretShopComplete, gg_rct_secretShopRegion )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_secretShopComplete, Condition( function Trig_secretShopComplete_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_secretShopComplete, function Trig_secretShopComplete_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: destroySecondaryBaseComplete
//===========================================================================
function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseComplete_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 3 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseComplete_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_COMPLETED, "TRIGSTR_6713" )
    call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest, true )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseComplete_Func004A )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_HumanVictory )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_resumeMusicTimer, false, 30 )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_destroySecondaryBaseComplete takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseComplete = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseComplete, gg_unit_unp1_0139, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_destroySecondaryBaseComplete, function Trig_destroySecondaryBaseComplete_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: destroyMainBaseUpdate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_destroyMainBaseUpdate_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 5 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_destroyMainBaseUpdate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_6714" )
    call QuestSetDescriptionBJ( udg_mainquest, "TRIGSTR_502" )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_HumanDefeat )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnBad )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnBad2 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnBad3 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnGood )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnGoodOutpost )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnHero )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_enemyScaling )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_destroyMainBaseUpdate_Func011A )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6764" )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_battletimer, false, 180.00 )
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ( GetLastCreatedTimerBJ(), "TRIGSTR_2416" )
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ( true, GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ() )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_spawnFinalBattle )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_destroyMainBaseUpdate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_destroyMainBaseUpdate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_destroyMainBaseUpdate, gg_unit_unp2_0025, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_destroyMainBaseUpdate, function Trig_destroyMainBaseUpdate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: unlockSecretShopUpdate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_unlockSecretShopUpdate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_ScoutLaunchBirth1 )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( gg_unit_n00O_0029, 'n00G', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_500" )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_Dofv_14376 )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_unlockSecretShopUpdate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_unlockSecretShopUpdate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_unlockSecretShopUpdate, gg_unit_unp1_0139, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_unlockSecretShopUpdate, function Trig_unlockSecretShopUpdate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: secretShopHint
//===========================================================================
function Trig_secretShopHint_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsQuestCompleted(udg_gateQuest) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_secretShopHint_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_L07CArthas31 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_519" )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_secretShopHint takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_secretShopHint = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_secretShopHint, gg_rct_secretShopRegion )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_secretShopHint, Condition( function Trig_secretShopHint_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_secretShopHint, function Trig_secretShopHint_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: openRedBase1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_openRedBase1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), false )
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func008Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), false )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_redBaseOpened == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I036'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openRedBase1_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob )
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func003A )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6669" )
            set udg_redBaseOpened = true
            set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func007A )
            call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, function Trig_openRedBase1_Func002Func003Func008A )
            call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        else
        endif
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_ATg2_0691 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, "TRIGSTR_495" )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_gateQuestFound )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_openRedBase1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_openRedBase1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_openRedBase1, gg_rct_secretdoor2 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_openRedBase1, Condition( function Trig_openRedBase1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_openRedBase1, function Trig_openRedBase1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: openRedBase2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_openRedBase2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), false )
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func008Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), false )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_redBaseOpened == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I036'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openRedBase2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openRedBase2_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob )
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func003A )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6690" )
            set udg_redBaseOpened = true
            set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func007A )
            call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_chaosAreaMain, function Trig_openRedBase2_Func002Func004Func008A )
            call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        else
        endif
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_B001_0690 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, "TRIGSTR_6707" )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_gateQuestFound )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_openRedBase2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_openRedBase2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_openRedBase2, gg_rct_secretdoor )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_openRedBase2, gg_rct_redBehind )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_openRedBase2, Condition( function Trig_openRedBase2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_openRedBase2, function Trig_openRedBase2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: openPurpleBase
//===========================================================================
function Trig_openPurpleBase_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), false )
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func012Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), false )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I03T'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openPurpleBase_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_purpleBaseOpened = true
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob )
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func006A )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6681" )
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_B000_1130 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_cage2, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func011A )
        call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_cage2, function Trig_openPurpleBase_Func002Func012A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce( udg_playGroup, "TRIGSTR_6682" )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_gateQuestFound )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_openPurpleBase takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_openPurpleBase = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_openPurpleBase, gg_rct_secretdoor3 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_openPurpleBase, Condition( function Trig_openPurpleBase_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_openPurpleBase, function Trig_openPurpleBase_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: openYellowBase
//===========================================================================
function Trig_openYellowBase_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()), udg_playGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), false )
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LOcg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func009Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ( GetEnumDestructable(), false )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I003'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_openYellowBase_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_openYellowBase_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_yellowBaseOpened = true
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_B002_3464 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6762" )
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_furblogAreaMain, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func008A )
        call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_furblogAreaMain, function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func009A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob )
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_openYellowBase_Func002Func012A )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6671" )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6763" )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_gateQuestFound )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_openYellowBase takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_openYellowBase = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_openYellowBase, gg_rct_yellowGate )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_openYellowBase, Condition( function Trig_openYellowBase_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_openYellowBase, function Trig_openYellowBase_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: forwardBaseCommanderSpawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_mortarCaptainSpawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00A', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "overhead", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\TalkToMe\\TalkToMe.mdl" )
    set udg_secondBaseQuestMark = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_MortarTeamPissed1 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( gg_trg_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn, gg_dest_LOcg_1059 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn, function Trig_forwardBaseCommanderSpawn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: startForwardBase
//===========================================================================
function Trig_startForwardBase_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_narg_0114) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_nsgg_0113) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_narg_0179) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startForwardBase_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PolledWait( 5.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00V', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_forwardBase), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_startForwardBase takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_startForwardBase = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_startForwardBase, gg_unit_nsgg_0113, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_startForwardBase, gg_unit_narg_0114, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_startForwardBase, gg_unit_narg_0179, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_startForwardBase, Condition( function Trig_startForwardBase_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_startForwardBase, function Trig_startForwardBase_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: buildForwardBase
//===========================================================================
function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbattackmove)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbattackmove) )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveDestructable( GetEnumDestructable() )
endfunction

function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem( GetEnumItem() )
endfunction

function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func011002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbattackmove)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), udg_tempPoint )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

function Trig_buildForwardBase_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_515" )
    call QuestSetDescriptionBJ( udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest, "TRIGSTR_516" )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbarea)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_fbarea)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func007A )
    call PolledWait( 6.00 )
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll( gg_rct_forwardBase, function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func009A )
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ( gg_rct_fbarea, function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func010A )
    set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_fbarea, Condition(function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func011002002))
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_buildForwardBase_Func012A )
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
    call PolledWait( 1.00 )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbpeasspawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[6] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbpeasspawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[7] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbpeasspawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[8] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbpeasspawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'hpea', udg_npc, udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_peasant[9] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ft1)
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[6], 'hgtw', udg_tempPoint )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ft2)
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[7], 'hgtw', udg_tempPoint )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ft3)
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[9], 'hgtw', udg_tempPoint )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_forwardBase)
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( udg_peasant[8], 'h00U', udg_tempPoint )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable )
    call PolledWait( 5.00 )
    call spawnB(40, 'u00E', gg_rct_outpost3, gg_rct_forwardBase)
    call PolledWait( 32.00 )
    call spawnB(40, 'u00E', gg_rct_outpost4, gg_rct_forwardBase)
    call PolledWait( 10.00 )
    call spawnB(40, 'u00E', gg_rct_outpost3, gg_rct_forwardBase)
    call PolledWait( 10.00 )
    call spawnB(40, 'u00E', gg_rct_outpost4, gg_rct_forwardBase)
    call PolledWait( 30.00 )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_peasant[6] )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_peasant[7] )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_peasant[8] )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_peasant[9] )
    call QuestMessageBJ( udg_playGroup, bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_517" )
    call QuestSetDescriptionBJ( udg_secondBaseDestroyQuest, "TRIGSTR_518" )
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_fbarea)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce( udg_playGroup, udg_tempPoint, 3.00 )
    call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_MuradinYesAttack3 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_buildForwardBase takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_buildForwardBase = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_buildForwardBase, function Trig_buildForwardBase_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: forwardBaseSetVariable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_forwardBaseSetVariable_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetConstructingStructure()) == 'h00U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_forwardBaseSetVariable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_forwardBase = GetConstructingStructure()
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_forwardBaseSetVariable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_START )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable, Condition( function Trig_forwardBaseSetVariable_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_forwardBaseSetVariable, function Trig_forwardBaseSetVariable_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: finalBattleComplete
//===========================================================================
function Trig_finalBattleComplete_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_bossgroup) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_finalBattleComplete_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_finalBattleComplete_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 30.00, "TRIGSTR_521" )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_endGameTimer, false, 30 )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_Credits )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_finalBattleComplete takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_finalBattleComplete = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_finalBattleComplete )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_finalBattleComplete, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_finalBattleComplete, function Trig_finalBattleComplete_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: endGame
//===========================================================================
function Trig_endGame_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomVictoryBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), true, true )
endfunction

function Trig_endGame_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER), function Trig_endGame_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_endGame takes nothing returns nothing
