    set gg_trg_endGame = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_endGame, udg_endGameTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_endGame, function Trig_endGame_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: potionStacking
//===========================================================================
function Trig_potionStacking_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemType(GetManipulatedItem()) == ITEM_TYPE_CHARGED ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_potionStacking_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(udg_tempItem) == GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(udg_tempUnit, GetForLoopIndexA())) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_tempItem != UnitItemInSlotBJ(udg_tempUnit, GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_potionStacking_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempUnit = GetManipulatingUnit()
    set udg_tempItem = GetManipulatedItem()
    set udg_tempItemType = GetItemTypeId(udg_tempItem)
    set udg_tempInt = GetItemCharges(udg_tempItem)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_potionStacking_Func005Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempInt = ( GetItemCharges(UnitItemInSlotBJ(udg_tempUnit, GetForLoopIndexA())) + udg_tempInt )
            set udg_activeItem = UnitItemInSlotBJ(udg_tempUnit, GetForLoopIndexA())
            call SetItemCharges( udg_activeItem, udg_tempInt )
            call RemoveItem( udg_tempItem )
            set udg_tempItem = udg_activeItem
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_potionStacking takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_potionStacking = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_potionStacking, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_potionStacking, Condition( function Trig_potionStacking_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_potionStacking, function Trig_potionStacking_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: destroyEffect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_destroyEffect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = udg_effectCounter
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_effects[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_effectCounter = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_destroyEffect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_destroyEffect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_destroyEffect, udg_effectDestroyTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_destroyEffect, function Trig_destroyEffect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: buyWeapon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_buyWeapon_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemType(GetSoldItem()) == ITEM_TYPE_PERMANENT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemType(GetSoldItem()) == ITEM_TYPE_MISCELLANEOUS ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemType(GetSoldItem()) == ITEM_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_buyWeapon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_buyWeapon_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_buyWeapon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( udg_itemSounds[GetRandomInt(0, 9)], 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", GetBuyingUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\ToonBoom\\ToonBoom.mdl" )
    set udg_effects[udg_effectCounter] = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set udg_effectCounter = ( udg_effectCounter + 1 )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_effectDestroyTimer, false, 1.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_buyWeapon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_buyWeapon = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_buyWeapon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_buyWeapon, Condition( function Trig_buyWeapon_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_buyWeapon, function Trig_buyWeapon_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: buyPotion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_buyPotion_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemType(GetSoldItem()) == ITEM_TYPE_CHARGED ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_buyPotion_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_buyPotion_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_buyPotion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ( gg_snd_PickUpItem, 100, GetBuyingUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", GetBuyingUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\ToonBoom\\ToonBoom.mdl" )
    set udg_effects[udg_effectCounter] = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set udg_effectCounter = ( udg_effectCounter + 1 )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_effectDestroyTimer, false, 1.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_buyPotion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_buyPotion = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_buyPotion, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_buyPotion, Condition( function Trig_buyPotion_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_buyPotion, function Trig_buyPotion_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: attacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_attacked_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(GetAttacker(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitIsSleepingBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 'BUsl') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_heroMade == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetAttackedUnitBJ() == udg_base ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) < 40 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_shopKeeperMade == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetAttackedUnitBJ() == udg_base ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_guardianMade == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetAttackedUnitBJ() == udg_base ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) < 70 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 1000) < udg_critlevel ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_attacked_Func005Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 100) < udg_critlevel ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A03Y', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANbf', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 99) < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 100) < ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02B', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) * 5 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'H000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 100) < ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02C', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) * 5 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(0, 100) < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func010Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'nsw1' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'nsw2' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'nsw3' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'n00W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_attacked_Func010Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func011Func003Func007002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01W', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) <= ( 10 + ( udg_lightningLevel * 5 ) ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func012Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func012Func002Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h016', udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A074', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A074', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_tempInt )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func012Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A075', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) <= ( 10 + ( udg_tempInt * 5 ) ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func013Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func013Func001Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h016', udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A055', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_tempInt )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHab', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) <= ( 10 + ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHab', GetAttacker()) * 5 ) ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "stop" )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func002C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_summonDefender )
        set udg_heroMade = true
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func003C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_summonShopkeeper )
        set udg_shopKeeperMade = true
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func004C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_summonGuardian )
        set udg_guardianMade = true
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_critlevel = 10
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func005Func003C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A02S', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A02S', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEim', GetAttacker()) )
            call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "dreadlordinferno", udg_infernopos )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_critlevel = ( 3 + ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A03Y', GetAttacker()) * 2 ) )
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func006Func005C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A03Y', GetAttacker()) * 10 ), 1 )
            call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_infernopos )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func007C() ) then
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func007Func001C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "drunkenhaze", GetAttacker() )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func008C() ) then
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func008Func001C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01Y', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "banish", GetAttacker() )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func009C() ) then
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func009Func002C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A021', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "frostnova", GetAttacker() )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func010C() ) then
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func010Func001C() ) then
            set udg_infernopos = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), udg_infernopos, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "drunkenhaze", GetAttacker() )
            call RemoveLocation( udg_infernopos)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_lightningLevel = GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01W', GetAttacker())
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func011Func003C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A006', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A006', GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_lightningLevel )
            set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(I2R(600), udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_attacked_Func011Func003Func007002003))
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "chainlightning", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_tempGroup) )
            call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_tempInt = GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A075', GetAttacker())
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func012Func002C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(I2R(600), udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_attacked_Func012Func002Func003002003))
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set udg_tempPlayer = GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())
            set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_attacked_Func012Func002Func007A )
            call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_attacked_Func013C() ) then
        if ( Trig_attacked_Func013Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(I2R(200), udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_attacked_Func013Func001Func003002003))
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
            set udg_tempInt = GetUnitLevel(GetAttacker())
            set udg_tempPlayer = GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())
            set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_attacked_Func013Func001Func008A )
            call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
            call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_attacked = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_attacked, function Trig_attacked_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemDrops
//===========================================================================
function Trig_items_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	call createItem('lmbr', 100,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('gold', 250 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I020', 500 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I01Z', 500 ,  GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('100K', 250,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tdex', 250 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tdx2', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tint', 250 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tin2', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tpow', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tstr', 250 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('tst2', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('manh', 250 ,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I051', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I00Q', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
	call createItem('I01Y', 500,   GetDyingUnit())
endfunction


function InitTrig_itemDrops takes nothing returns nothing
	local integer i = 18
	local integer maxEnemies = 24
	set gg_trg_itemDrops = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >=maxEnemies 
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple( gg_trg_itemDrops, Player(i),  EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
		set i=i+1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemDrops, function Trig_items_Actions )
endfunction	


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_death_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_foodCountReal < 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nvlk' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nvk2' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nvil' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nvlw' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nvl2' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nech' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'npig' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nshe' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_death_Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_outpostGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'H00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I034'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I03R'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CheckItemStatus(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I03S'), bj_ITEM_STATUS_OWNED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_compUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func008Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func008Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func008Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_bossgroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func009Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomDefeatBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), "TRIGSTR_3115" )
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func009Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'htow' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'hkee' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'hcas' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'h009' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_npc ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_death_Func009Func012C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_ncnk_0250 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_hhou_0129 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_baseMaxed == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_hhou_0130 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_baseMaxed == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_hhou_0128 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_baseMaxed == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_hhou_0127 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_baseMaxed == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10000) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_death_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_foodCountReal = udg_foodCountReal - 1
        if ( Trig_death_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_foodCountReal = 0.00
        else
        endif
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_setFood )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_death_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I03T', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_death_Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I036', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_death_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I003', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_GoodJob )
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetDyingUnit(), udg_outpostGroup )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = ( udg_enemypower + 5 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'lmbr', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = ( udg_enemypower + 10 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'gold', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHfa', GetKillingUnitBJ())) * 10.00 ) ) + 10.00 ) )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_tempUnit = GetDyingUnit()
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(udg_tempUnit)
        set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(udg_tempPoint, GetRandomReal(0, 100.00), GetRandomReal(0, 100.00))
        call CreateItemLoc( 'I048', udg_bossitem )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_tempUnit = GetDyingUnit()
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(udg_tempUnit)
        set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(udg_tempPoint, GetRandomReal(0, 100.00), GetRandomReal(0, 100.00))
        call CreateItemLoc( 'gold', udg_bossitem )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func006C() ) then
        call spawnTome()
        call spawnTome()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_tempUnit = GetDyingUnit()
        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base)
        call ReviveHeroLoc( udg_tempUnit, udg_tempPoint, false )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func008C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_death_Func008Func001A )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_OrcVictory )
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetDyingUnit(), udg_bossgroup )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = ( udg_enemypower + 2 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'lmbr', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = ( udg_enemypower + 4 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00), GetRandomReal(-500.00, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'gold', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        if ( Trig_death_Func008Func007C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I03T', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_death_Func008Func008C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I036', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_death_Func008Func009C() ) then
            set udg_bossitem = OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00), GetRandomReal(0, 500.00))
            call CreateItemLoc( 'I003', udg_bossitem )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_bossitem)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func009C() ) then
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_TragicConfrontation )
        call SetUserControlForceOff( udg_playGroup )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6770" )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 5.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6771" )
        call StopMusicBJ( false )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_MuradinTaunt2 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
        call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_death_Func009Func010A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func010C() ) then
        call WaygateActivateBJ( true, gg_unit_nwgt_0094 )
        call WaygateSetDestinationLocBJ( gg_unit_nwgt_0094, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TPOUTPOST) )
        call WaygateActivateBJ( true, gg_unit_nwgt_0248 )
        call WaygateSetDestinationLocBJ( gg_unit_nwgt_0248, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TPENEMY) )
        call PingMinimapLocForForce( GetPlayersAll(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TPOUTPOST), 1 )
        call PingMinimapLocForForce( GetPlayersAll(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TPENEMY), 1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_6772" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_archerCount = udg_archerCount - 1
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount - 1
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_footmanCount = udg_footmanCount - 1
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_priestCount = udg_priestCount - 1
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_death_Func015C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitAttackCooldown(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 1) * 0.90 ), 1 )
        set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, ( "You have gained |c000000FF10% Bonus Attack Speed|r from the Lightning Energy Passive" + "" ) )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_death = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_death, function Trig_death_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: enemyDeath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enemyDeath_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[0] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_enemies[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_enemyDeath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_enemyDeath_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_badgroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyDeath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_enemyUnitCount=udg_enemyUnitCount-1
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetDyingUnit(), udg_badgroup )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_enemyDeath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_enemyDeath = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_enemyDeath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_enemyDeath, Condition( function Trig_enemyDeath_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_enemyDeath, function Trig_enemyDeath_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: goodDeath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_goodDeath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == udg_npc ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_goodgroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_goodDeath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetDyingUnit(), udg_goodgroup )
    set udg_goodUnitCount=udg_goodUnitCount-1
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_goodDeath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_goodDeath = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_goodDeath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_goodDeath, Condition( function Trig_goodDeath_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_goodDeath, function Trig_goodDeath_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_leave_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) / udg_players ), GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) / udg_players ), GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER )
endfunction

function Trig_leave_Func008002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempUnit = udg_heroArray[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( udg_tempUnit, udg_heros )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_tempUnit )
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple( GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_playGroup )
    set udg_players = getPlayerCount()
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_leave_Func006A )
    set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(GetTriggerPlayer())
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_leave_Func008002 )
    call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_setDifficulty )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_leave takes nothing returns nothing

	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_leave = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_leave, Player(i))
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_leave, function Trig_leave_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: removeItems
//===========================================================================
function Trig_removeItems_Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemLifeBJ(GetEnumItem()) == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_removeItems_Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_removeItems_Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ItemsToClean = ( udg_ItemsToClean + 1 )
        set udg_CleanedItem[udg_ItemsToClean] = GetEnumItem()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_removeItems_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ItemsToClean > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_removeItems_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ItemCleanupFlag == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_removeItems_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_removeItems_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ItemCleanupFlag = false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = udg_ItemsToClean
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetItemLifeBJ( udg_CleanedItem[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00 )
            call RemoveItem( udg_CleanedItem[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
            set udg_CleanedItem[GetForLoopIndexA()] = null
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        set udg_ItemsToClean = -1
        call EnumItemsInRectBJ( GetPlayableMapRect(), function Trig_removeItems_Func001Func004A )
        if ( Trig_removeItems_Func001Func005C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_ItemCleanupTimer, false, 1.50 )
            set udg_ItemCleanupFlag = true
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_removeItems takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_removeItems = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_removeItems, 15.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_removeItems, udg_ItemCleanupTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_removeItems, function Trig_removeItems_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: enemyScaling
//===========================================================================
function Trig_enemyScaling_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemypower == 16 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyScaling_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), ( GetPlayerHandicapBJ(GetEnumPlayer()) * 1.20 ) )
    call SetPlayerHandicapDamageBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerHandicapBJ(GetEnumPlayer()) )
endfunction

function Trig_enemyScaling_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemypower >= 16 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_enemyScaling_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_enemypower = ( udg_enemypower + 1 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_spawnBoss )
    if ( Trig_enemyScaling_Func003C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 30, "TRIGSTR_7662" )
        call PlaySoundBJ( gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_enemyScaling_Func004C() ) then
        call ForForce( udg_enemyPlayers, function Trig_enemyScaling_Func004Func002A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_enemyScaling takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_enemyScaling = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_enemyScaling, function Trig_enemyScaling_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: moralBoost
//===========================================================================
function Trig_moralBoost_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I058' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_moralBoost_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSellingUnit(), "roar" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_moralBoost takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_moralBoost = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_moralBoost, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_moralBoost, Condition( function Trig_moralBoost_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_moralBoost, function Trig_moralBoost_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: learnSkill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_learnSkill_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A028' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_learnSkill_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'AEah' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_learnSkill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_learnSkill_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Remg', ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Remg', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + 1 ), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_learnSkill_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap( 'Remg', ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Remg', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + 1 ), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_learnSkill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_learnSkill = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_learnSkill, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_learnSkill, function Trig_learnSkill_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: gainLevel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_gainLevel_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'H004' == GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gainLevel_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ModuloInteger(GetHeroLevel(GetLevelingUnit()), 4) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gainLevel_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'H000' == GetUnitTypeId(GetLevelingUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_rangerSpeed[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))] < 420.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gainLevel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_gainLevel_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'ACcb', GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ACcb', GetTriggerUnit()) + 1 ) )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gainLevel_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_gainLevel_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_rangerSpeed[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))] = ( udg_rangerSpeed[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))] + 30.00 )
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetLevelingUnit(), udg_rangerSpeed[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))] )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_gainLevel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_gainLevel = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_gainLevel, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_gainLevel, function Trig_gainLevel_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: finishSpell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_finishSpell_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_finishSpell_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_finishSpell_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_finishSpell_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04Z' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_finishSpell_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_finishSpell_Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_finishSpell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_finishSpell_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_finishSpell_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A04Z', GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'even', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 60, 'BHwe', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 10 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A04Z', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) ), 1 )
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_finishSpell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_finishSpell = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_finishSpell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_finishSpell, function Trig_finishSpell_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: castAbility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_castAbility_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AEsh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_castAbility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_castAbility_Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetSpellAbilityUnit(), udg_poisonStrikePoint )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_poisonStrikePoint)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_castAbility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_castAbility = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_castAbility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_castAbility, function Trig_castAbility_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: startEffect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_startEffect_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < ( udg_tempLevel * 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A020' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func003Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A024', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A024', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A025', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "entanglingroots", GetEnumUnit() )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A025' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AEsh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A027' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 'H000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_startEffect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempLevel = GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A020', GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetSpellTargetUnit()) + ( 100.00 + ( I2R(udg_tempLevel) * 100.00 ) ) ) )
        if ( Trig_startEffect_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), 100 )
            call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), 100 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetSpellTargetLoc()
        set udg_tempGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(I2R(( 200 + ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A025', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) * 50 ) )), udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_startEffect_Func003Func003002003))
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_tempGroup, function Trig_startEffect_Func003Func005A )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_tempGroup)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_poisonStrikePoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h015', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 15.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06T', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A06T', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A04W', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) )
        call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", GetSpellAbilityUnit() )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h015', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A054', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A054', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A04W', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) )
        call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", GetSpellAbilityUnit() )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_startEffect_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        set udg_tempReal = GetUnitFacing(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A027', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A027', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A025', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) )
        set udg_tempPoint2 = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_tempPoint, 125.00, ( udg_tempReal + 12.00 ))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "shockwave", udg_tempPoint2 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_tempPoint, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitExplodedBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), true )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A027', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A027', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A025', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) )
        set udg_tempPoint2 = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_tempPoint, 125.00, ( udg_tempReal - 12.00 ))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "shockwave", udg_tempPoint2 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint2)
        call RemoveLocation (udg_tempPoint)
        return
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_startEffect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_startEffect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_startEffect, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_startEffect, function Trig_startEffect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: poisonEffect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_poisonEffect_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "right hand", GetEnumUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaBlood\\NagaBloodWindserpent.mdl" )
    set udg_tempEffect = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call DestroyEffect(udg_tempEffect)
endfunction

function Trig_poisonEffect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_poisongroup, function Trig_poisonEffect_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_poisonEffect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_poisonEffect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_poisonEffect, 8.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_poisonEffect, function Trig_poisonEffect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lightningEffect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lightningEffect_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "left hand", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIlb\\AIlbSpecialArt.mdl" )
    set udg_tempEffect = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call DestroyEffect(udg_tempEffect)
endfunction

function Trig_lightningEffect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_lightninggroup, function Trig_lightningEffect_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lightningEffect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lightningEffect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_lightningEffect, 3.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lightningEffect, function Trig_lightningEffect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: eggsack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_eggsack_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_eggsack_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_eggsack_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_eggsack_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_eggsack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_eggsack_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nspr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_eggsack_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nssp', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_eggsack_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nsgt', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_eggsack_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nsbm', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_eggsack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_eggsack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_eggsack, function Trig_eggsack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bloodsack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 18 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) < 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bloodsack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nspr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nssp', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nsgt', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_bloodsack_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = OffsetLocation(GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable()), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00), GetRandomReal(-50.00, 50.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nsbm', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bloodsack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bloodsack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bloodsack, function Trig_bloodsack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: camMid
//===========================================================================
function Trig_camMid_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), 0 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2025.00, 0 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_camMid takes nothing returns nothing
    
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_camMid = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_camMid, Player(i), "-mid", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_camMid, function Trig_camMid_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: camFar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_camFar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), 0 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2500.00, 0 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_camFar takes nothing returns nothing
    
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_camFar = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_camFar, Player(i), "-far", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_camFar, function Trig_camFar_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: camVeryFar
//===========================================================================
