    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), 0 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2950.00, 0 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_camVeryFar takes nothing returns nothing
    
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_camVeryFar = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_camVeryFar, Player(i), "-vfar", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_camVeryFar, function Trig_camVeryFar_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_kills_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.0, ( GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()) + ( " Kills: " + I2S(GetPlayerScore(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_SCORE_UNITS_KILLED)) ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( udg_playGroup, function Trig_kills_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_kills takes nothing returns nothing
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
    	set gg_trg_kills = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_kills, Player(i), "-kills", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
    	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_kills, function Trig_kills_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: playtime
//===========================================================================
function Trig_playtime_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.0, ( "Playtime: " + ( I2S(udg_mtics) + " minutes." ) ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_playtime takes nothing returns nothing
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_playtime = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_playtime, Player(i), "-playtime", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_playtime, function Trig_playtime_Actions  )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: calcPlaytime
//===========================================================================
function Trig_calcPlaytime_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_mtics = 1
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_calcPlaytime takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_calcPlaytime = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_calcPlaytime, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_calcPlaytime, function Trig_calcPlaytime_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: stats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_stats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	set udg_tempStr = "Gold Income: " + I2S(udg_income*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2,udg_players)) + "\nLumber Income: " + I2S(udg_lumber*udg_maxPlayers/IMaxBJ(2, udg_players)) +  "\nFootmen Count: " + I2S(udg_footmanCount) + "\nArcher Count: " + I2S(udg_archerCount) + "\nPriest Count: " + I2S(udg_priestCount) + "\nChance to spawn Hero: " + I2S(udg_heroSpawnChance) + "%\nKnight Count: " + I2S(udg_knightCount) + "\nMortar Count: " + I2S(udg_mortarCount) + "\nTotal Units: " + I2S(udg_footmanCount+udg_archerCount+udg_priestCount+udg_mortarCount+udg_knightCount) + "/35\nUpgrade Count: " + I2S(udg_upgradeLevel)+ "\nFood: " + I2S(udg_foodCount) + "/" + I2S(udg_maxFood) + " +" + R2S(udg_interestRate) + "%"
	call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_playGroup, 5.00, udg_tempStr )

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_stats takes nothing returns nothing
	local integer maxPlayers = udg_maxPlayers
	local integer i = 0
	set gg_trg_stats = CreateTrigger(  )
	loop
		exitwhen i >= maxPlayers
		call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_stats, Player(i), "-stats", true )
		set i = i + 1
	endloop
	call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_stats, function Trig_stats_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: defenderHeroDeath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_defenderHeroDeath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_defenderHeroDeath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_defenderHeroDeath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath, Condition( function Trig_defenderHeroDeath_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_defenderHeroDeath, function Trig_defenderHeroDeath_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: guardianHeroDeath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_guardianHeroDeath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_guardian ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_guardianHeroDeath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_guardianHeroDeath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath, Condition( function Trig_guardianHeroDeath_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_guardianHeroDeath, function Trig_guardianHeroDeath_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_guardian ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroAttack )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroDeath )

    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroDeath )

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroDeath, Condition( function Trig_shopKeeperHeroDeath_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroDeath, function Trig_shopKeeperHeroDeath_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: defenderHeroAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_defenderHeroAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_bspawnp = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_mountainKingArea)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_hero, "patrol", udg_bspawnp )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_bspawnp)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_defenderHeroAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_defenderHeroAttack, function Trig_defenderHeroAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: guardianHeroAttack
//===========================================================================

    set udg_bspawnp = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_mountainKingArea)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_guardian, "patrol", udg_bspawnp )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_bspawnp)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_guardianHeroAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_guardianHeroAttack, function Trig_guardianHeroAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: shopKeeperHeroAttack
//===========================================================================

    set udg_bspawnp = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_shopKeeperArea)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_shopKeeper, "patrol", udg_bspawnp )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_bspawnp)

    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroAttack )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroAttack, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_shopKeeperHeroAttack, function Trig_shopKeeperHeroAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: badAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_badAttack_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetEnumUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("none") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_badAttack_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_badAttack_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_badAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_badgroup, function Trig_badAttack_Func002A )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_badAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_badAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_badAttack, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_badAttack, function Trig_badAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: goodAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_goodAttack_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetEnumUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("none") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_goodAttack_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_goodAttack_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_goodAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_enemybase)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_goodgroup, function Trig_goodAttack_Func003A )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_goodAttack, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_goodAttack, function Trig_goodAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    return true

        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
    else
    endif

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_bossAttack, function Trig_bossAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: computerPlayersLevelUp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_compGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func003C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEsf' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02C' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func004C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANvc' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHfa' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHfs' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOhw' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANlm' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func005C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEme' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEim' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02F' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func006C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOww' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANbf' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANca' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A00I' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02L' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func007C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEtq' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A029' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A028' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A025' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02M' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func008C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANmo' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANfl' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A01W' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOvd' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A020' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func009C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02J' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANab' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEah' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A03Y' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEsh' )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Func010C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02E' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A027' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02B' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ANst' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'ACs8' )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_computerPlayersLevelUp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp, Condition( function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_computerPlayersLevelUp, function Trig_computerPlayersLevelUp_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: computerPlayersAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 6) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 7) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 7) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 7) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetEnumUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("none") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_enemybase)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
            if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_qo1)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
            else
                if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(GetPlayableMapRect())
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                else
                    if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_playGroup))))
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_base)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_tempPoint = GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_compGroup))))
                                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_cage3)
                                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_forwardSpawn)
                                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_042)
                                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_lumarea2)
                                                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                                            else
                                                set udg_tempPoint = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_lumarea)
                                                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_tempPoint )
                                                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_compUnits, function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_computerPlayersAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_computerPlayersAttack, function Trig_computerPlayersAttack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: swordmastery
//===========================================================================
function Trig_swordmastery_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'I053' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swordmastery_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_mastery[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swordmastery_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swordmastery_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_swordmastery_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_swordmastery_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_mastery[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitAttackCooldown(GetManipulatingUnit(), 1) - 0.30 ), 1 )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8233" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8234" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_swordmastery takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_swordmastery = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_swordmastery, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_swordmastery, Condition( function Trig_swordmastery_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_swordmastery, function Trig_swordmastery_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: swiftmastery
//===========================================================================
function Trig_swiftmastery_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'I052' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swiftmastery_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_mastery[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swiftmastery_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_swiftmastery_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_swiftmastery_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_swiftmastery_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_mastery[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetManipulatingUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8236" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8271" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_swiftmastery takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_swiftmastery = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_swiftmastery, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_swiftmastery, Condition( function Trig_swiftmastery_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_swiftmastery, function Trig_swiftmastery_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_masterOfSurvival_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_masterOfSurvival_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_mastery[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetManipulatingUnit()) + 800 ) )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8246" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8272" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( 'I056' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_theWizard_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_querk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_theWizard_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_theWizard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_theWizard_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_theWizard_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_querk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetManipulatingUnit()) + 400 ) )
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 1) - 5 ), 1 )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8238" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8237" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_theWizard, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )

        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( Trig_glassCannon_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_glassCannon_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_querk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetManipulatingUnit()) - 250 ) )
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 1) + 20 ), 1 )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8240" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8273" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_theTank_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_theTank_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_querk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetManipulatingUnit()) + 6.00 ) )
            call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitAttackCooldown(GetManipulatingUnit(), 1) + 0.10 ), 1 )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8242" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_8274" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: assasinationUltimate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'I05A' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_assasinationUltimate_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_assasinationUltimate_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07D', GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetManipulatingUnit()) + 8 ) )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_394" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_391" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_assasinationUltimate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_assasinationUltimate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_assasinationUltimate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_assasinationUltimate, Condition( function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_assasinationUltimate, function Trig_assasinationUltimate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: vampirismUltimate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'I059' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_vampirismUltimate_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_vampirismUltimate_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07J', GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07J', GetManipulatingUnit()) + 5 ) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07I', GetManipulatingUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07I', GetManipulatingUnit()) )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_398" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_395" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_vampirismUltimate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_vampirismUltimate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_vampirismUltimate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_vampirismUltimate, Condition( function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_vampirismUltimate, function Trig_vampirismUltimate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: combatSurvivalUltimate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'I05B' == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetManipulatingUnit()) >= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_legendarySkill[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))] = true
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07F', GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07F', GetManipulatingUnit()) + 7 ) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07E', GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07E', GetManipulatingUnit()) + 2 ) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07K', GetManipulatingUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07K', GetManipulatingUnit()) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07B', GetManipulatingUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07B', GetManipulatingUnit()) )
        else
            set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_424" )
            call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
        endif
    else
        set udg_tempPlayerGroup = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetManipulatingUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempPlayerGroup, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_417" )
        call DestroyForce(udg_tempPlayerGroup)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_combatSurvivalUltimate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_combatSurvivalUltimate = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_combatSurvivalUltimate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_combatSurvivalUltimate, Condition( function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_combatSurvivalUltimate, function Trig_combatSurvivalUltimate_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lv5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lv5_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetLevelingUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_lv5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07D', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetLevelingUnit()) + 2 ) )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_793" )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lv5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lv5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_lv5, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_lv5, Condition( function Trig_lv5_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lv5, function Trig_lv5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lv10
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lv10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetLevelingUnit()) == 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07E', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07E', GetLevelingUnit()) + 3 ) )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_974" )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_lv10, Condition( function Trig_lv10_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lv10, function Trig_lv10_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetLevelingUnit()) == 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_794" )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lv25
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lv25_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetLevelingUnit()) == 25 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_lv25_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07F', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07F', GetLevelingUnit()) + 3 ) )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07D', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetLevelingUnit()) + 3 ) )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_795" )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_lv25, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_lv25, Condition( function Trig_lv25_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lv25, function Trig_lv25_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lv35
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetLevelingUnit()) == 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_lv35_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07F', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07F', GetLevelingUnit()) + 5 ) )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07D', GetLevelingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetLevelingUnit()) + 5 ) )
    set udg_tempForce = GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLevelingUnit()))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( udg_tempForce, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_796" )
    call DestroyForce(udg_tempForce)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lv35, function Trig_lv35_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: armorTome
//===========================================================================
function Trig_armorTome_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_armorTome_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetManipulatingUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetManipulatingUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_armorTome takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_armorTome = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_armorTome, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_armorTome, Condition( function Trig_armorTome_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_armorTome, function Trig_armorTome_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: staminaTome
//===========================================================================
function Trig_staminaTome_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_staminaTome_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07E', GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07E', GetManipulatingUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_staminaTome takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_staminaTome = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_staminaTome, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_staminaTome, Condition( function Trig_staminaTome_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_staminaTome, function Trig_staminaTome_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: poisonRegen
//===========================================================================
function Trig_poisonRegen_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + ( I2R(BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit())) * 0.04 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_poisonRegen_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_poisongroup, function Trig_poisonRegen_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_poisonRegen takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_poisonRegen = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_poisonRegen, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_poisonRegen, function Trig_poisonRegen_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: regen
//===========================================================================
function Trig_regen_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + ( I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07E', GetEnumUnit())) * 0.40 ) ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + ( I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07E', GetEnumUnit())) * 0.20 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_regen_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_heros, function Trig_regen_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_regen takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_regen = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_regen, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_regen, function Trig_regen_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: startItemStats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_startItemStats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_itemStatCount = 0
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_critStats )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_stamStats )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_evasionStats )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_lifestealStats )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_startItemStats takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_startItemStats = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_startItemStats, function Trig_startItemStats_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: critStats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_critStats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I018'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04F'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I019'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04G'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01A'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 6
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04H'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 6
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I03Z'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01V'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01H'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 5
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01J'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 7
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01I'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 9
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04K'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 16
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I02V'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 10
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07D'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I027'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 10
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_critStats takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_critStats = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_critStats, function Trig_critStats_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: stamStats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_stamStats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01F'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 3
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04C'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 3
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01E'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 5
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01G'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 7
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04D'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 7
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I012'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 1
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I014'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I013'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 3
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I042'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I043'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 5
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01B'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01D'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 6
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01C'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 8
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'kgal'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 5
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07E'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I035'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 1
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_stamStats takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_stamStats = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_stamStats, function Trig_stamStats_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: evasionStats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_evasionStats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04S'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04P'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 10
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I015'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04I'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I016'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04J'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I017'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 6
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07F'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04R'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 20
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_evasionStats takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_evasionStats = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_evasionStats, function Trig_evasionStats_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lifestealStats
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lifestealStats_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I010'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 2
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I011'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 4
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I00T'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 6
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I04E'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 5
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I040'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 15
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I05I'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 7
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I02L'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 35
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
    // ITEM
    set udg_itemStatAbilities[udg_itemStatCount] = 'A07J'
    set udg_itemStatTypes[udg_itemStatCount] = 'I01P'
    set udg_itemStatValues[udg_itemStatCount] = 30
    set udg_itemStatCount = ( udg_itemStatCount + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lifestealStats takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lifestealStats = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_lifestealStats, function Trig_lifestealStats_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemStatAdd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemStatAdd_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == udg_itemStatTypes[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemStatAdd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = udg_itemStatCount
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_itemStatAdd_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( udg_itemStatAbilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_itemStatAbilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetManipulatingUnit()) + udg_itemStatValues[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07I', GetManipulatingUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07J', GetManipulatingUnit()) )
            return
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemStatAdd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemStatAdd = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemStatAdd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemStatAdd, function Trig_itemStatAdd_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: itemStatRemove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_itemStatRemove_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == udg_itemStatTypes[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_itemStatRemove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = udg_itemStatCount
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_itemStatRemove_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( udg_itemStatAbilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetManipulatingUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_itemStatAbilities[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetManipulatingUnit()) - udg_itemStatValues[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) )
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A07I', GetManipulatingUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07J', GetManipulatingUnit()) )
            return
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_itemStatRemove takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_itemStatRemove = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_itemStatRemove, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_itemStatRemove, function Trig_itemStatRemove_Actions )
endfunction
